an3.1:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an3.1:2.1_0: “Yāni kānici, bhikkhave, bhayāni uppajjanti sabbāni tāni bālato uppajjanti, no paṇḍitato.
an3.1:2.2_0: Ye keci upaddavā uppajjanti sabbe te bālato uppajjanti, no paṇḍitato.
an3.1:2.3_0: Ye keci upasaggā uppajjanti sabbe te bālato uppajjanti, no paṇḍitato.
an3.1:2.4_2: naḷāgārā vā tiṇāgārā vā aggi mutto kūṭāgārānipi ḍahati ullittāvalittāni nivātāni phusitaggaḷāni pihitavātapānāni;
an3.1:2.5_2: yāni kānici bhayāni uppajjanti sabbāni tāni bālato uppajjanti,
an3.1:2.6_0: Ye keci upaddavā uppajjanti sabbe te bālato uppajjanti, no paṇḍitato.
an3.1:2.7_0: Ye keci upasaggā uppajjanti sabbe te bālato uppajjanti, no paṇḍitato.
an3.1:3.1_0: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sappaṭibhayo bālo, appaṭibhayo paṇḍito.
an3.1:3.4_0: Natthi, bhikkhave, paṇḍitato bhayaṁ, natthi paṇḍitato upaddavo, natthi paṇḍitato upasaggo.
an3.1:4.2_0: ‘yehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo te tayo dhamme abhinivajjetvā,
an3.1:4.2_1: yehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo te tayo dhamme samādāya vattissāmā’ti.
an3.2:1.1_0: “Kammalakkhaṇo, bhikkhave, bālo, kammalakkhaṇo paṇḍito, apadānasobhanī paññāti.
an3.2:1.2_0: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo.
an3.2:1.5_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo.
an3.2:2.1_0: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
an3.2:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
an3.2:3.2_0: ‘yehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo te tayo dhamme abhinivajjetvā,
an3.2:3.2_1: yehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo te tayo dhamme samādāya vattissāmā’ti.
an3.3:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bālo duccintitacintī ca hoti dubbhāsitabhāsī ca dukkaṭakammakārī ca.
an3.3:1.4_2: bālo duccintitacintī ca abhavissa dubbhāsitabhāsī ca dukkaṭakammakārī ca,
an3.3:1.6_2: bālo duccintitacintī ca hoti dubbhāsitabhāsī ca dukkaṭakammakārī ca tasmā naṁ paṇḍitā jānanti:
an3.3:1.8_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni bālanimittāni bālāpadānāni.
an3.3:2.1_0: Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni paṇḍitanimittāni paṇḍitāpadānāni.
an3.3:2.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, paṇḍito sucintitacintī ca hoti subhāsitabhāsī ca sukatakammakārī ca.
an3.3:2.4_2: paṇḍito sucintitacintī ca abhavissa subhāsitabhāsī ca sukatakammakārī ca,
an3.3:2.6_2: paṇḍito sucintitacintī ca hoti subhāsitabhāsī ca sukatakammakārī ca tasmā naṁ paṇḍitā jānanti:
an3.3:2.8_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni paṇḍitanimittāni paṇḍitāpadānāni.
an3.4:1.3_2: parassa kho pana accayaṁ desentassa yathādhammaṁ nappaṭiggaṇhāti.
an3.4:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo.
an3.4:2.1_0: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
an3.4:2.3_2: parassa kho pana accayaṁ desentassa yathādhammaṁ paṭiggaṇhāti.
an3.4:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
an3.5:1.3_2: parassa kho pana yoniso pañhaṁ vissajjitaṁ parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi siliṭṭhehi upagatehi nābbhanumoditā hoti.
an3.5:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo.
an3.5:2.1_0: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
an3.5:2.3_2: parassa kho pana yoniso pañhaṁ vissajjitaṁ parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi siliṭṭhehi upagatehi abbhanumoditā hoti.
an3.5:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
an3.6:1.3_0: Akusalena kāyakammena, akusalena vacīkammena, akusalena manokammena.
an3.6:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo.
an3.6:2.1_0: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
an3.6:2.3_0: Kusalena kāyakammena, kusalena vacīkammena, kusalena manokammena.
an3.6:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
an3.8:1.4_0: Imehi, kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
an3.8:2.2_0: ‘yehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo te tayo dhamme abhinivajjetvā,
an3.8:2.2_1: yehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo te tayo dhamme samādāya vattissāmā’ti.
an3.9:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso khataṁ upahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati,
an3.9:1.1_3: sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṁ,
an3.9:1.4_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso khataṁ upahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati,
an3.9:1.4_3: sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṁ,
an3.9:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito viyatto sappuriso akkhataṁ anupahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati,
an3.9:2.1_3: anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca viññūnaṁ,
an3.9:2.4_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito viyatto sappuriso akkhataṁ anupahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati,
an3.9:2.4_3: anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca viññūnaṁ,
an3.10:1.1_0: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato tayo male appahāya yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an3.10:1.3_0: Dussīlo ca hoti, dussīlyamalañcassa appahīnaṁ hoti;
an3.10:1.4_0: issukī ca hoti, issāmalañcassa appahīnaṁ hoti;
an3.10:1.5_0: maccharī ca hoti, maccheramalañcassa appahīnaṁ hoti.
an3.10:1.6_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato ime tayo male appahāya yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an3.10:2.1_0: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato tayo male pahāya yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge.
an3.10:2.3_0: Sīlavā ca hoti, dussīlyamalañcassa pahīnaṁ hoti;
an3.10:2.4_0: anissukī ca hoti, issāmalañcassa pahīnaṁ hoti;
an3.10:2.5_0: amaccharī ca hoti, maccheramalañcassa pahīnaṁ hoti.
an3.10:2.6_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato ime tayo male pahāya yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge”ti.
an3.11:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato ñāto bhikkhu bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanadukkhāya,
an3.11:1.1_3: bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an3.11:1.4_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato ñāto bhikkhu bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanadukkhāya,
an3.11:1.4_3: bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an3.11:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato ñāto bhikkhu bahujanahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanasukhāya,
an3.11:2.1_3: bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an3.11:2.3_0: Anulomike kāyakamme samādapeti, anulomike vacīkamme samādapeti, anulomikesu dhammesu samādapeti.
an3.11:2.4_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato ñāto bhikkhu bahujanahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanasukhāya,
an3.11:2.4_3: bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan”ti.
an3.12:1.1_0: “Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa yāvajīvaṁ sāraṇīyāni bhavanti.
an3.12:1.3_0: Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, padese rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto jāto hoti.
an3.12:1.4_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṁ rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa yāvajīvaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ hoti.
an3.12:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, yasmiṁ padese rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto hoti.
an3.12:2.2_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyaṁ rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa yāvajīvaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ hoti.
an3.12:3.1_2: yasmiṁ padese rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto saṅgāmaṁ abhivijinitvā vijitasaṅgāmo tameva saṅgāmasīsaṁ ajjhāvasati.
an3.12:3.2_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyaṁ rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa yāvajīvaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ hoti.
an3.12:3.3_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa yāvajīvaṁ sāraṇīyāni bhavanti.
an3.12:4.1_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tīṇimāni bhikkhussa yāvajīvaṁ sāraṇīyāni bhavanti.
an3.12:4.3_2: padese bhikkhu kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti.
an3.12:4.4_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṁ bhikkhussa yāvajīvaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ hoti.
an3.12:5.1_2: yasmiṁ padese bhikkhu ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti,
an3.12:5.2_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyaṁ bhikkhussa yāvajīvaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ hoti.
an3.12:6.1_2: yasmiṁ padese bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an3.12:6.2_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyaṁ bhikkhussa yāvajīvaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ hoti.
an3.12:6.3_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi bhikkhussa yāvajīvaṁ sāraṇīyāni bhavantī”ti.
an3.13:1.5_2: ekacco puggalo nīce kule paccājāto hoti,
an3.13:1.5_3: caṇḍālakule vā venakule vā nesādakule vā rathakārakule vā pukkusakule vā dalidde appannapānabhojane kasiravuttike,
an3.13:1.6_0: So ca hoti dubbaṇṇo duddasiko okoṭimako bavhābādho kāṇo vā kuṇī vā khañjo vā pakkhahato vā,
an3.13:1.6_1: na lābhī annassa pānassa vatthassa yānassa mālāgandhavilepanassa seyyāvasathapadīpeyyassa.
an3.13:2.2_2: rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa jeṭṭho putto hoti ābhiseko anabhisitto acalappatto.
an3.13:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, rājā hoti khattiyo muddhāvasitto.
an3.13:3.8_0: Yā hissa, bhikkhave, pubbe anabhisittassa abhisekāsā sā paṭippassaddhā.
an3.13:3.10_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.13:4.1_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā bhikkhūsu.
an3.13:4.5_2: ekacco puggalo dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo asuci saṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño
an3.13:4.7_0: ‘itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
an3.13:4.9_0: ‘kudāssu nāma ahampi āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissāmī’ti.
an3.13:5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo.
an3.13:5.4_0: ‘itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
an3.13:5.6_0: ‘kudāssu nāma ahampi āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissāmī’ti.
an3.13:6.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṁ hoti khīṇāsavo.
an3.13:6.4_0: ‘itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
an3.13:6.6_0: ‘kudāssu nāma ahampi āsavānaṁ khayā …pe… sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissāmī’ti.
an3.13:6.8_0: Yā hissa, bhikkhave, pubbe avimuttassa vimuttāsā sā paṭippassaddhā.
an3.13:6.10_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā bhikkhūsū”ti.
an3.14:1.1_0: “Yopi so, bhikkhave, rājā cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā sopi na arājakaṁ cakkaṁ vattetī”ti.
an3.14:1.2_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an3.14:1.3_0: “ko pana, bhante, rañño cakkavattissa dhammikassa dhammarañño rājā”ti?
an3.14:1.5_1: rājā cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaṁyeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ karonto dhammaṁ
an3.14:1.5_2: apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahati antojanasmiṁ.
an3.14:2.1_1: rājā cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaṁyeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ karonto dhammaṁ
an3.14:2.1_2: apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahati khattiyesu,
an3.14:2.2_0: Sa kho so bhikkhu rājā cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaṁyeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ
an3.14:2.2_1: garuṁ karonto dhammaṁ apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ
an3.14:2.3_0: Taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ kenaci manussabhūtena paccatthikena pāṇinā.
an3.14:3.1_1: tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaṁyeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ
an3.14:3.1_2: karonto dhammaṁ apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahati
an3.14:3.2_0: ‘evarūpaṁ kāyakammaṁ sevitabbaṁ, evarūpaṁ kāyakammaṁ na sevitabban’ti.
an3.14:4.1_1: tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaṁyeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ
an3.14:4.1_2: karonto dhammaṁ apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahati
an3.14:4.2_0: ‘evarūpaṁ vacīkammaṁ sevitabbaṁ, evarūpaṁ vacīkammaṁ na sevitabban’ti …pe… manokammasmiṁ:
an3.14:4.3_0: ‘evarūpaṁ manokammaṁ sevitabbaṁ, evarūpaṁ manokammaṁ na sevitabban’ti.
an3.14:5.1_1: tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaṁyeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ
an3.14:5.1_2: karonto dhammaṁ apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahitvā
an3.14:5.2_0: Taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
an3.15:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ viharati isipatane migadāye.
an3.15:2.2_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, rājā sacetano rathakāraṁ āmantesi:
an3.15:2.3_0: ‘ito me, samma rathakāra, channaṁ māsānaṁ accayena saṅgāmo bhavissati.
an3.15:2.4_0: Sakkhissasi me, samma rathakāra, navaṁ cakkayugaṁ kātun’ti?
an3.15:2.5_0: ‘Sakkomi, devā’ti kho, bhikkhave, rathakāro rañño sacetanassa paccassosi.
an3.15:2.6_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, rathakāro chahi māsehi chārattūnehi ekaṁ cakkaṁ niṭṭhāpesi.
an3.15:2.7_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, rājā sacetano rathakāraṁ āmantesi:
an3.15:2.9_0: ‘Imehi kho, deva, chahi māsehi chārattūnehi ekaṁ cakkaṁ niṭṭhitan’ti.
an3.15:2.10_0: ‘Sakkhissasi pana me, samma rathakāra, imehi chahi divasehi dutiyaṁ cakkaṁ niṭṭhāpetun’ti?
an3.15:2.11_3: rathakāro chahi divasehi dutiyaṁ cakkaṁ niṭṭhāpetvā navaṁ cakkayugaṁ ādāya yena rājā sacetano tenupasaṅkami;
an3.15:2.13_2: cakkaṁ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṁ chārattūnehi yañca te idaṁ cakkaṁ chahi divasehi niṭṭhitaṁ,
an3.15:3.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, rathakāro yaṁ taṁ cakkaṁ chahi divasehi niṭṭhitaṁ taṁ pavattesi.
an3.15:3.2_0: Taṁ pavattitaṁ samānaṁ yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa gati tāvatikaṁ gantvā ciṅgulāyitvā bhūmiyaṁ papati.
an3.15:3.3_0: Yaṁ pana taṁ cakkaṁ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṁ chārattūnehi taṁ pavattesi.
an3.15:3.4_0: Taṁ pavattitaṁ samānaṁ yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa gati tāvatikaṁ gantvā akkhāhataṁ maññe aṭṭhāsi.
an3.15:4.1_2: hetu ko paccayo yamidaṁ cakkaṁ chahi divasehi niṭṭhitaṁ taṁ pavattitaṁ samānaṁ yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa
an3.15:4.1_3: gati tāvatikaṁ gantvā ciṅgulāyitvā bhūmiyaṁ papati?
an3.15:4.2_2: hetu ko paccayo yamidaṁ cakkaṁ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṁ chārattūnehi taṁ pavattitaṁ samānaṁ yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa
an3.15:4.2_3: gati tāvatikaṁ gantvā akkhāhataṁ maññe aṭṭhāsī’ti?
an3.15:4.3_1: cakkaṁ chahi divasehi niṭṭhitaṁ tassa nemipi savaṅkā sadosā sakasāvā,
an3.15:4.4_2: nābhiyāpi savaṅkattā sadosattā sakasāvattā pavattitaṁ samānaṁ yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa gati tāvatikaṁ gantvā ciṅgulāyitvā bhūmiyaṁ papati.
an3.15:4.5_1: cakkaṁ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṁ chārattūnehi tassa nemipi avaṅkā adosā akasāvā,
an3.15:4.6_2: nābhiyāpi avaṅkattā adosattā akasāvattā pavattitaṁ samānaṁ yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa gati tāvatikaṁ gantvā akkhāhataṁ maññe aṭṭhāsī’ti.
an3.15:5.1_0: Siyā kho pana, bhikkhave, tumhākaṁ evamassa:
an3.15:5.2_0: ‘añño nūna tena samayena so rathakāro ahosī’ti.
an3.15:5.3_0: Na kho panetaṁ, bhikkhave, evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an3.15:5.4_0: Ahaṁ tena samayena so rathakāro ahosiṁ.
an3.15:5.5_0: Tadāhaṁ, bhikkhave, kusalo dāruvaṅkānaṁ dārudosānaṁ dārukasāvānaṁ.
an3.15:5.6_2: arahaṁ sammāsambuddho kusalo kāyavaṅkānaṁ kāyadosānaṁ kāyakasāvānaṁ,
an3.15:5.7_2: bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā kāyavaṅko appahīno kāyadoso kāyakasāvo,
an3.15:5.7_8: seyyathāpi taṁ cakkaṁ chahi divasehi niṭṭhitaṁ.
an3.15:6.1_2: bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā kāyavaṅko pahīno kāyadoso kāyakasāvo,
an3.15:6.1_8: seyyathāpi taṁ cakkaṁ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṁ chārattūnehi.
an3.16:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno hoti,
an3.16:1.1_3: yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an3.16:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvāro hoti, bhojane mattaññū hoti, jāgariyaṁ anuyutto hoti.
an3.16:2.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvāro hoti?
an3.16:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
an3.16:2.3_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati,
an3.16:2.8_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
an3.16:2.9_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati,
an3.16:2.10_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvāro hoti.
an3.16:3.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhojane mattaññū hoti?
an3.16:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṁ āhāreti:
an3.16:3.3_0: ‘neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya,
an3.16:3.3_1: yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya vihiṁsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya,
an3.16:3.3_4: yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā’ti.
an3.16:3.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhojane mattaññū hoti.
an3.16:4.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jāgariyaṁ anuyutto hoti?
an3.16:4.2_2: bhikkhu divasaṁ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodheti,
an3.16:4.2_3: rattiyā paṭhamaṁ yāmaṁ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodheti,
an3.16:4.2_4: rattiyā majjhimaṁ yāmaṁ dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṁ kappeti pāde pādaṁ accādhāya sato sampajāno uṭṭhānasaññaṁ manasi karitvā,
an3.16:4.2_5: rattiyā pacchimaṁ yāmaṁ paccuṭṭhāya caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodheti.
an3.16:4.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jāgariyaṁ anuyutto hoti.
an3.16:4.4_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno hoti,
an3.16:4.4_3: yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṁ khayāyā”ti.
an3.18:1.1_0: “Sace vo, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṁ puccheyyuṁ:
an3.18:1.3_0: Nanu tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṁ puṭṭhā aṭṭīyeyyātha harāyeyyātha jiguccheyyāthā”ti?
an3.18:1.5_3: dibbena vaṇṇena dibbena sukhena dibbena yasena dibbenādhipateyyena aṭṭīyatha harāyatha jigucchatha;
an3.19:1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato pāpaṇiko abhabbo anadhigataṁ vā bhogaṁ adhigantuṁ,
an3.19:1.3_2: pāpaṇiko pubbaṇhasamayaṁ na sakkaccaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhāti,
an3.19:1.4_2: tīhi aṅgehi samannāgato pāpaṇiko abhabbo anadhigataṁ vā bhogaṁ adhigantuṁ,
an3.19:2.1_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo anadhigataṁ vā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ adhigantuṁ,
an3.19:2.1_3: adhigataṁ vā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.
an3.19:2.3_2: bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṁ na sakkaccaṁ samādhinimittaṁ adhiṭṭhāti,
an3.19:2.4_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo anadhigataṁ vā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ adhigantuṁ,
an3.19:2.4_3: adhigataṁ vā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.
an3.19:3.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato pāpaṇiko bhabbo anadhigataṁ vā bhogaṁ adhigantuṁ,
an3.19:3.4_2: tīhi aṅgehi samannāgato pāpaṇiko bhabbo anadhigataṁ vā bhogaṁ adhigantuṁ,
an3.19:4.1_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo anadhigataṁ vā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ adhigantuṁ,
an3.19:4.1_3: adhigataṁ vā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.
an3.19:4.4_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo anadhigataṁ vā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ adhigantuṁ,
an3.19:4.4_3: adhigataṁ vā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ phātiṁ kātun”ti.
an3.20:1.1_0: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato pāpaṇiko nacirasseva mahattaṁ vepullattaṁ pāpuṇāti bhogesu.
an3.20:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpaṇiko cakkhumā ca hoti vidhuro ca nissayasampanno ca.
an3.20:1.6_0: ‘idaṁ paṇiyaṁ evaṁ kītaṁ, evaṁ vikkayamānaṁ, ettakaṁ mūlaṁ bhavissati, ettako udayo’ti.
an3.20:1.7_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pāpaṇiko cakkhumā hoti.
an3.20:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpaṇiko kusalo hoti paṇiyaṁ ketuñca vikketuñca.
an3.20:2.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pāpaṇiko vidhuro hoti.
an3.20:3.2_2: pāpaṇikaṁ ye te gahapatī vā gahapatiputtā vā aḍḍhā mahaddhanā mahābhogā te evaṁ jānanti:
an3.20:3.3_0: ‘ayaṁ kho bhavaṁ pāpaṇiko cakkhumā vidhuro ca paṭibalo puttadārañca posetuṁ,
an3.20:3.5_0: ‘ito, samma pāpaṇika, bhoge karitvā puttadārañca posehi, amhākañca kālena kālaṁ anuppadehī’ti.
an3.20:3.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pāpaṇiko nissayasampanno hoti.
an3.20:3.7_2: tīhi aṅgehi samannāgato pāpaṇiko nacirasseva mahattaṁ vepullattaṁ pāpuṇāti bhogesu.
an3.20:4.1_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nacirasseva mahattaṁ vepullattaṁ pāpuṇāti kusalesu dhammesu.
an3.20:4.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhumā ca hoti vidhuro ca nissayasampanno ca.
an3.20:4.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhumā hoti.
an3.20:5.2_2: bhikkhu āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya,
an3.20:5.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vidhuro hoti.
an3.20:6.2_2: bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā te kālena kālaṁ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati:
an3.20:6.4_2: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṁ paṭivinodenti.
an3.20:6.5_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hoti.
an3.20:6.6_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nacirasseva mahattaṁ vepullattaṁ pāpuṇāti kusalesu dhammesū”ti.
an3.21:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an3.21:1.3_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca samiddho āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an3.21:1.4_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
an3.21:1.4_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ samiddhaṁ āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca:
an3.21:2.1_0: “Tayome, āvuso samiddha, puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.21:2.4_0: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.21:2.5_0: Imesaṁ, āvuso, tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
an3.21:3.1_0: “Tayome, āvuso sāriputta, puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.21:3.4_0: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.21:3.5_2: ayaṁ me puggalo khamati imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an3.21:4.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ mahākoṭṭhikaṁ etadavoca:
an3.21:4.2_0: “tayome, āvuso koṭṭhika, puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.21:4.5_0: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.21:4.6_0: Imesaṁ, āvuso, tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
an3.21:5.1_0: “Tayome, āvuso sāriputta, puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.21:5.4_0: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.21:5.5_2: ayaṁ me puggalo khamati imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an3.21:6.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an3.21:6.2_0: “tayome, āvuso sāriputta, puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.21:6.5_0: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.21:6.6_0: Imesaṁ, āvuso, tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
an3.21:7.1_0: “Tayome, āvuso koṭṭhika, puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.21:7.4_0: Ime kho, āvuso, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.21:7.5_2: ayaṁ me puggalo khamati imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an3.21:8.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantañca samiddhaṁ āyasmantañca mahākoṭṭhikaṁ etadavoca:
an3.21:8.2_0: “byākataṁ kho, āvuso, amhehi sabbeheva yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
an3.21:8.3_0: Āyāmāvuso, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamissāma; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocessāma.
an3.21:8.4_0: Yathā no bhagavā byākarissati tathā naṁ dhāressāmā”ti.
an3.21:8.5_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā ca samiddho āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
an3.21:8.6_0: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca samiddho āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an3.21:8.7_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto yāvatako ahosi āyasmatā ca samiddhena āyasmatā ca mahākoṭṭhikena
an3.21:8.7_1: saddhiṁ kathāsallāpo taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato ārocesi.
an3.21:9.2_0: ‘ayaṁ imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’ti.
an3.21:9.3_2: vijjati yvāyaṁ puggalo saddhāvimutto svāssa arahattāya paṭipanno,
an3.21:9.3_3: yvāyaṁ puggalo kāyasakkhī svāssa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā,
an3.21:9.3_4: yo cāyaṁ puggalo diṭṭhippatto sopassa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā.
an3.21:10.1_0: Na khvettha, sāriputta, sukaraṁ ekaṁsena byākātuṁ:
an3.21:10.2_0: ‘ayaṁ imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’ti.
an3.21:10.3_2: vijjati yvāyaṁ puggalo kāyasakkhī svāssa arahattāya paṭipanno,
an3.21:10.3_3: yvāyaṁ puggalo saddhāvimutto svāssa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā,
an3.21:10.3_4: yo cāyaṁ puggalo diṭṭhippatto sopassa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā.
an3.21:11.1_0: Na khvettha, sāriputta, sukaraṁ ekaṁsena byākātuṁ:
an3.21:11.2_0: ‘ayaṁ imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’ti.
an3.21:11.3_2: vijjati yvāyaṁ puggalo diṭṭhippatto svāssa arahattāya paṭipanno,
an3.21:11.3_3: yvāyaṁ puggalo saddhāvimutto svāssa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā,
an3.21:11.3_4: yo cāyaṁ puggalo kāyasakkhī sopassa sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā.
an3.21:12.1_0: Na khvettha, sāriputta, sukaraṁ ekaṁsena byākātuṁ:
an3.21:12.2_0: ‘ayaṁ imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’”ti.
an3.22:1.3_2: ekacco gilāno labhanto vā sappāyāni bhojanāni alabhanto vā sappāyāni bhojanāni,
an3.22:1.3_3: labhanto vā sappāyāni bhesajjāni alabhanto vā sappāyāni bhesajjāni,
an3.22:1.3_4: labhanto vā patirūpaṁ upaṭṭhākaṁ alabhanto vā patirūpaṁ upaṭṭhākaṁ neva vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhā.
an3.22:2.1_2: ekacco gilāno labhanto vā sappāyāni bhojanāni alabhanto vā sappāyāni bhojanāni,
an3.22:2.1_3: labhanto vā sappāyāni bhesajjāni alabhanto vā sappāyāni bhesajjāni,
an3.22:2.1_4: labhanto vā patirūpaṁ upaṭṭhākaṁ alabhanto vā patirūpaṁ upaṭṭhākaṁ vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhā.
an3.22:3.1_2: ekacco gilāno labhantova sappāyāni bhojanāni no alabhanto,
an3.22:3.1_4: labhantova patirūpaṁ upaṭṭhākaṁ no alabhanto vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhā.
an3.22:4.1_2: yvāyaṁ gilāno labhantova sappāyāni bhojanāni no alabhanto,
an3.22:4.1_4: labhantova patirūpaṁ upaṭṭhākaṁ no alabhanto vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhā, imaṁ kho,
an3.22:4.1_6: gilānaṁ paṭicca gilānabhattaṁ anuññātaṁ gilānabhesajjaṁ anuññātaṁ gilānupaṭṭhāko anuññāto.
an3.22:4.2_0: Imañca pana, bhikkhave, gilānaṁ paṭicca aññepi gilānā upaṭṭhātabbā.
an3.22:4.3_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo gilānā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.22:5.1_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tayome gilānūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.22:5.3_2: ekacco puggalo labhanto vā tathāgataṁ dassanāya alabhanto vā tathāgataṁ dassanāya,
an3.22:5.3_3: labhanto vā tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ savanāya alabhanto vā tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ
an3.22:5.3_4: savanāya neva okkamati niyāmaṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an3.22:6.1_2: ekacco puggalo labhanto vā tathāgataṁ dassanāya alabhanto vā tathāgataṁ dassanāya,
an3.22:6.1_3: labhanto vā tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ savanāya alabhanto vā tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ
an3.22:6.1_4: savanāya okkamati niyāmaṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an3.22:7.1_2: ekacco puggalo labhantova tathāgataṁ dassanāya no alabhanto,
an3.22:7.1_3: labhantova tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ savanāya no alabhanto okkamati niyāmaṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an3.22:8.1_2: yvāyaṁ puggalo labhantova tathāgataṁ dassanāya no alabhanto,
an3.22:8.1_3: labhantova tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ savanāya no alabhanto okkamati niyāmaṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ, imaṁ kho,
an3.22:8.2_0: Imañca pana, bhikkhave, puggalaṁ paṭicca aññesampi dhammo desetabbo.
an3.22:8.3_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo gilānūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an3.23:1.4_2: sabyābajjhaṁ manosaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharitvā sabyābajjhaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
an3.23:1.5_0: Tamenaṁ sabyābajjhaṁ lokaṁ upapannaṁ samānaṁ sabyābajjhā phassā phusanti.
an3.23:1.6_0: So sabyābajjhehi phassehi phuṭṭho samāno sabyābajjhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayati ekantadukkhaṁ,
an3.23:2.2_2: abyābajjhaṁ manosaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharitvā abyābajjhaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
an3.23:2.3_0: Tamenaṁ abyābajjhaṁ lokaṁ upapannaṁ samānaṁ abyābajjhā phassā phusanti.
an3.23:2.4_0: So abyābajjhehi phassehi phuṭṭho samāno abyābajjhaṁ vedanaṁ vedayati ekantasukhaṁ,
an3.23:3.1_2: ekacco puggalo sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi kāyasaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti,
an3.23:3.2_2: sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi manosaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharitvā sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi lokaṁ upapajjati.
an3.23:3.3_0: Tamenaṁ sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi lokaṁ upapannaṁ samānaṁ sabyābajjhāpi abyābajjhāpi phassā phusanti.
an3.23:3.4_0: So sabyābajjhehipi abyābajjhehipi phassehi phuṭṭho samāno sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi vedanaṁ vedayati vokiṇṇasukhadukkhaṁ,
an3.23:3.4_1: seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā.
an3.23:3.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an3.24:1.3_2: puggalaṁ āgamma puggalo buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti,
an3.24:1.4_0: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, puggalo imassa puggalassa bahukāro.
an3.24:2.1_2: yaṁ puggalaṁ āgamma puggalo ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti,
an3.24:2.2_0: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, puggalo imassa puggalassa bahukāro.
an3.24:3.1_2: yaṁ puggalaṁ āgamma puggalo āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati;
an3.24:3.2_0: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, puggalo imassa puggalassa bahukāro.
an3.24:3.3_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā puggalassa bahukārā.
an3.24:4.1_0: Imehi ca pana, bhikkhave, tīhi puggalehi imassa puggalassa natthañño puggalo bahukāroti vadāmi.
an3.24:4.2_2: tiṇṇaṁ puggalānaṁ iminā puggalena na suppatikāraṁ vadāmi,
an3.25:1.3_0: Arukūpamacitto puggalo, vijjūpamacitto puggalo, vajirūpamacitto puggalo.
an3.25:1.5_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo
an3.25:1.6_0: appampi vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an3.25:1.7_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, duṭṭhāruko kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalāya vā ghaṭṭito bhiyyoso mattāya āsavaṁ deti;
an3.25:1.8_0: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo
an3.25:1.9_0: appampi vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an3.25:2.3_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, cakkhumā puriso rattandhakāratimisāyaṁ vijjantarikāya rūpāni passeyya;
an3.25:3.2_2: ekacco puggalo āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an3.25:3.3_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, vajirassa natthi kiñci abhejjaṁ maṇi vā pāsāṇo vā;
an3.25:3.4_0: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo āsavānaṁ khayā …pe… upasampajja viharati.
an3.25:3.6_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an3.26:1.3_0: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:1.4_0: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:1.5_0: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:1.6_0: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo?
an3.26:1.7_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo hīno hoti sīlena samādhinā paññāya.
an3.26:1.8_2: puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampā.
an3.26:2.1_0: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo?
an3.26:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sadiso hoti sīlena samādhinā paññāya.
an3.26:2.3_0: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:2.5_0: Sīlasāmaññagatānaṁ sataṁ sīlakathā ca no bhavissati,
an3.26:2.6_0: Samādhisāmaññagatānaṁ sataṁ samādhikathā ca no bhavissati,
an3.26:2.7_0: Paññāsāmaññagatānaṁ sataṁ paññākathā ca no bhavissati,
an3.26:2.8_0: Tasmā evarūpo puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:3.1_0: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo?
an3.26:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo adhiko hoti sīlena samādhinā paññāya.
an3.26:3.3_0: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:3.5_1: paripūraṁ vā sīlakkhandhaṁ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmi;
an3.26:3.6_1: paripūraṁ vā samādhikkhandhaṁ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmi;
an3.26:3.7_1: paripūraṁ vā paññākkhandhaṁ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti.
an3.26:3.8_0: Tasmā evarūpo puggalo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:3.9_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasminti.
an3.27:1.3_0: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
an3.27:1.4_0: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
an3.27:1.5_0: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.27:1.6_0: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo?
an3.27:1.7_2: ekacco puggalo dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo asuci saṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakammanto,
an3.27:1.8_0: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
an3.27:1.10_3: atha kho naṁ pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati:
an3.27:1.12_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ahi gūthagato kiñcāpi na daṁsati, atha kho naṁ makkheti;
an3.27:1.13_2: kiñcāpi evarūpassa puggalassa na diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjati,
an3.27:1.13_3: atha kho naṁ pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati:
an3.27:1.15_0: Tasmā evarūpo puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
an3.27:2.1_0: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo?
an3.27:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo,
an3.27:2.3_0: appampi vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati,
an3.27:2.4_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, duṭṭhāruko kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalāya vā ghaṭṭito bhiyyoso mattāya āsavaṁ deti;
an3.27:2.6_2: tindukālātaṁ kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalāya vā ghaṭṭitaṁ bhiyyoso mattāya cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati;
an3.27:2.8_0: seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gūthakūpo kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalāya vā ghaṭṭito bhiyyoso mattāya duggandho hoti;
an3.27:2.9_0: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo,
an3.27:2.10_0: appampi vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati,
an3.27:2.11_0: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
an3.27:2.13_0: Akkoseyyapi maṁ paribhāseyyapi maṁ anatthampi maṁ kareyyāti.
an3.27:2.14_0: Tasmā evarūpo puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
an3.27:3.1_0: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo?
an3.27:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo.
an3.27:3.3_0: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.27:3.5_3: atha kho naṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati:
an3.27:3.7_0: Tasmā evarūpo puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.27:3.8_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasminti.
an3.28:1.5_2: ekacco puggalo sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagato vā pūgamajjhagato vā rājakulamajjhagato vā abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho:
an3.28:1.5_13: iti attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā sampajānamusā bhāsitā hoti.
an3.28:2.2_2: ekacco puggalo sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagato vā pūgamajjhagato vā rājakulamajjhagato vā abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho:
an3.28:2.2_13: iti attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā na sampajānamusā bhāsitā hoti.
an3.28:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo pharusaṁ vācaṁ pahāya pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti;
an3.28:3.3_0: yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā tathārūpiṁ vācaṁ bhāsitā hoti.
an3.28:3.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an3.29:1.5_2: ekaccassa puggalassa tathārūpaṁ cakkhu na hoti yathārūpena cakkhunā anadhigataṁ vā bhogaṁ adhigaccheyya adhigataṁ vā bhogaṁ phātiṁ kareyya;
an3.29:1.6_0: tathārūpampissa cakkhu na hoti yathārūpena cakkhunā kusalākusale dhamme jāneyya,
an3.29:2.2_2: ekaccassa puggalassa tathārūpaṁ cakkhu hoti yathārūpena cakkhunā anadhigataṁ vā bhogaṁ adhigaccheyya adhigataṁ vā bhogaṁ phātiṁ kareyya;
an3.29:2.3_0: tathārūpaṁ panassa cakkhu na hoti yathārūpena cakkhunā kusalākusale dhamme jāneyya,
an3.29:3.2_2: ekaccassa puggalassa tathārūpaṁ cakkhu hoti yathārūpena cakkhunā anadhigataṁ vā bhogaṁ adhigaccheyya,
an3.29:3.3_0: tathārūpampissa cakkhu hoti yathārūpena cakkhunā kusalākusale dhamme jāneyya;
an3.29:3.4_0: sāvajjānavajje dhamme jāneyya, hīnappaṇīte dhamme jāneyya, kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme jāneyya.
an3.29:3.6_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasminti.
an3.30:1.3_0: Avakujjapañño puggalo, ucchaṅgapañño puggalo, puthupañño puggalo.
an3.30:1.5_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ārāmaṁ gantā hoti abhikkhaṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ santike dhammassavanāya.
an3.30:1.6_0: Tassa bhikkhū dhammaṁ desenti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ,
an3.30:1.7_0: So tasmiṁ āsane nisinno tassā kathāya neva ādiṁ manasi karoti,
an3.30:1.8_0: vuṭṭhitopi tamhā āsanā tassā kathāya neva ādiṁ manasi karoti,
an3.30:1.9_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, kumbho nikujjo tatra udakaṁ āsittaṁ vivaṭṭati, no saṇṭhāti;
an3.30:1.10_2: idhekacco puggalo ārāmaṁ gantā hoti abhikkhaṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ santike dhammassavanāya.
an3.30:1.11_0: Tassa bhikkhū dhammaṁ desenti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ,
an3.30:1.12_0: So tasmiṁ āsane nisinno tassā kathāya neva ādiṁ manasi karoti,
an3.30:1.13_0: vuṭṭhitopi tamhā āsanā tassā kathāya neva ādiṁ manasi karoti,
an3.30:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ārāmaṁ gantā hoti abhikkhaṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ santike dhammassavanāya.
an3.30:2.3_0: Tassa bhikkhū dhammaṁ desenti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ,
an3.30:2.4_0: So tasmiṁ āsane nisinno tassā kathāya ādimpi manasi karoti,
an3.30:2.5_0: vuṭṭhito ca kho tamhā āsanā tassā kathāya neva ādiṁ manasi karoti,
an3.30:2.6_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, purisassa ucchaṅge nānākhajjakāni ākiṇṇāni—
an3.30:2.8_0: So tamhā āsanā vuṭṭhahanto satisammosā pakireyya.
an3.30:2.9_2: idhekacco puggalo ārāmaṁ gantā hoti abhikkhaṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ santike dhammassavanāya.
an3.30:2.10_0: Tassa bhikkhū dhammaṁ desenti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ,
an3.30:2.11_0: So tasmiṁ āsane nisinno tassā kathāya ādimpi manasi karoti,
an3.30:2.12_0: vuṭṭhito ca kho tamhā āsanā tassā kathāya neva ādiṁ manasi karoti,
an3.30:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ārāmaṁ gantā hoti abhikkhaṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ santike dhammassavanāya.
an3.30:3.3_0: Tassa bhikkhū dhammaṁ desenti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ,
an3.30:3.4_0: So tasmiṁ āsane nisinno tassā kathāya ādimpi manasi karoti,
an3.30:3.5_0: vuṭṭhitopi tamhā āsanā tassā kathāya ādimpi manasi karoti,
an3.30:3.6_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, kumbho ukkujjo tatra udakaṁ āsittaṁ saṇṭhāti no vivaṭṭati;
an3.30:3.7_2: idhekacco puggalo ārāmaṁ gantā hoti abhikkhaṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ santike dhammassavanāya.
an3.30:3.8_0: Tassa bhikkhū dhammaṁ desenti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ,
an3.30:3.9_0: So tasmiṁ āsane nisinno tassā kathāya ādimpi manasi karoti,
an3.30:3.10_0: vuṭṭhitopi tamhā āsanā tassā kathāya ādimpi manasi karoti,
an3.30:3.12_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasminti.
an3.31:1.1_0: “Sabrahmakāni, bhikkhave, tāni kulāni yesaṁ puttānaṁ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti.
an3.31:1.2_0: Sapubbācariyakāni, bhikkhave, tāni kulāni yesaṁ puttānaṁ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti.
an3.31:1.3_0: Sāhuneyyāni, bhikkhave, tāni kulāni yesaṁ puttānaṁ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti.
an3.31:1.8_0: Bahukārā, bhikkhave, mātāpitaro puttānaṁ, āpādakā posakā, imassa lokassa dassetāroti.
an3.32:1.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.32:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an3.32:2.1_1: bhikkhuno tathārūpo samādhipaṭilābho yathā imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā nāssu,
an3.32:2.2_0: yañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ upasampajja viharato ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na honti tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ upasampajja vihareyyā”ti?
an3.32:2.3_1: bhikkhuno tathārūpo samādhipaṭilābho yathā imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā nāssu,
an3.32:2.4_0: yañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ upasampajja viharato ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na honti tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ upasampajja vihareyyā”ti.
an3.32:3.1_1: siyā bhikkhuno tathārūpo samādhipaṭilābho yathā imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā nāssu,
an3.32:3.2_0: yañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ upasampajja viharato ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na honti tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ upasampajja vihareyyā”ti?
an3.32:4.2_0: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānan’ti.
an3.32:4.3_1: siyā bhikkhuno tathārūpo samādhipaṭilābho yathā imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā nāssu,
an3.32:4.4_0: yañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ upasampajja viharato ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na honti tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ upasampajja vihareyyāti.
an3.32:5.1_0: Idañca pana metaṁ, ānanda, sandhāya bhāsitaṁ pārāyane puṇṇakapañhe:
an3.33:1.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.33:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an3.33:1.3_0: vitthārenapi kho ahaṁ, sāriputta, dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ;
an3.33:1.4_0: saṅkhittavitthārenapi kho ahaṁ, sāriputta, dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ;
an3.33:2.2_1: bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na bhavissanti,
an3.33:2.2_2: yañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ upasampajja viharato ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na honti tañca cetovimuttiṁ
an3.33:3.1_2: bhikkhuno imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na honti,
an3.33:3.1_3: bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na honti,
an3.33:3.1_4: yañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ upasampajja viharato ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na honti tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati;
an3.33:3.3_0: ‘bhikkhu acchecchi taṇhaṁ, vivattayi saṁyojanaṁ, sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassa’.
an3.33:3.4_0: Idañca pana metaṁ, sāriputta, sandhāya bhāsitaṁ pārāyane udayapañhe:
an3.34:2.1_3: yatthassa attabhāvo nibbattati tattha taṁ kammaṁ vipaccati.
an3.34:2.2_0: Yattha taṁ kammaṁ vipaccati tattha tassa kammassa vipākaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti,
an3.34:2.2_1: diṭṭhe vā dhamme upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye.
an3.34:3.1_3: yatthassa attabhāvo nibbattati tattha taṁ kammaṁ vipaccati.
an3.34:3.2_0: Yattha taṁ kammaṁ vipaccati tattha tassa kammassa vipākaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti,
an3.34:3.2_1: diṭṭhe vā dhamme upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye.
an3.34:4.1_3: yatthassa attabhāvo nibbattati tattha taṁ kammaṁ vipaccati.
an3.34:4.2_0: Yattha taṁ kammaṁ vipaccati tattha tassa kammassa vipākaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti,
an3.34:4.2_1: diṭṭhe vā dhamme upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye.
an3.34:5.1_2: bījāni akhaṇḍāni apūtīni avātātapahatāni sārādāni sukhasayitāni sukhette suparikammakatāya bhūmiyā nikkhittāni.
an3.34:5.3_0: Evassu tāni, bhikkhave, bījāni vuddhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyuṁ.
an3.34:5.4_2: yaṁ lobhapakataṁ kammaṁ lobhajaṁ lobhanidānaṁ lobhasamudayaṁ,
an3.34:5.4_3: yatthassa attabhāvo nibbattati tattha taṁ kammaṁ vipaccati.
an3.34:5.5_0: Yattha taṁ kammaṁ vipaccati tattha tassa kammassa vipākaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti,
an3.34:5.5_1: diṭṭhe vā dhamme upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye.
an3.34:6.2_0: yaṁ mohapakataṁ kammaṁ mohajaṁ mohanidānaṁ mohasamudayaṁ,
an3.34:6.2_1: yatthassa attabhāvo nibbattati tattha taṁ kammaṁ vipaccati.
an3.34:6.3_0: Yattha taṁ kammaṁ vipaccati tattha tassa kammassa vipākaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti,
an3.34:6.3_1: diṭṭhe vā dhamme upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye.
an3.34:6.4_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi nidānāni kammānaṁ samudayāya.
an3.34:8.1_3: lobhe vigate evaṁ taṁ kammaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ.
an3.34:9.1_3: dose vigate evaṁ taṁ kammaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ.
an3.34:10.1_3: mohe vigate evaṁ taṁ kammaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ.
an3.34:11.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, bījāni akhaṇḍāni apūtīni avātātapahatāni sārādāni sukhasayitāni.
an3.34:11.4_0: Masiṁ karitvā mahāvāte vā ophuṇeyya nadiyā vā sīghasotāya pavāheyya.
an3.34:11.5_2: bījāni ucchinnamūlāni tālāvatthukatāni anabhāvaṅkatāni āyatiṁ anuppādadhammāni.
an3.34:11.6_2: yaṁ alobhapakataṁ kammaṁ alobhajaṁ alobhanidānaṁ alobhasamudayaṁ,
an3.34:11.6_3: lobhe vigate evaṁ taṁ kammaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ.
an3.34:12.2_0: yaṁ amohapakataṁ kammaṁ amohajaṁ amohanidānaṁ amohasamudayaṁ,
an3.34:12.2_1: mohe vigate evaṁ taṁ kammaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti …pe…
an3.34:12.4_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi nidānāni kammānaṁ samudayāyāti.
an3.35:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā āḷaviyaṁ viharati gomagge siṁsapāvane paṇṇasanthare.
an3.35:1.3_0: Atha kho hatthako āḷavako jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno addasa bhagavantaṁ gomagge siṁsapāvane paṇṇasanthare nisinnaṁ.
an3.35:1.4_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho hatthako āḷavako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an3.35:1.7_0: Ye ca pana loke sukhaṁ senti, ahaṁ tesaṁ aññataro”ti.
an3.35:2.4_0: Ye ca pana loke sukhaṁ senti, ahaṁ tesaṁ aññataro’”ti.
an3.35:3.1_0: “Tena hi, kumāra, taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi. Yathā te khameyya tathā naṁ byākareyyāsi.
an3.35:3.2_1: idhassa gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā kūṭāgāraṁ ullittāvalittaṁ nivātaṁ phusitaggaḷaṁ pihitavātapānaṁ.
an3.35:3.3_0: Tatrassa pallaṅko gonakatthato paṭikatthato paṭalikatthato kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇo sauttaracchado ubhato lohitakūpadhāno;
an3.35:3.5_0: catasso ca pajāpatiyo manāpāmanāpena paccupaṭṭhitā assu.
an3.35:3.6_0: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, kumāra, sukhaṁ vā so sayeyya no vā?
an3.35:3.9_0: Ye ca pana loke sukhaṁ senti, so tesaṁ aññataro”ti.
an3.35:4.2_0: api nu tassa gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā uppajjeyyuṁ rāgajā pariḷāhā kāyikā vā cetasikā vā yehi
an3.35:4.2_1: so rāgajehi pariḷāhehi pariḍayhamāno dukkhaṁ sayeyyā”ti?
an3.35:5.1_1: gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā rāgajehi pariḷāhehi pariḍayhamāno dukkhaṁ sayeyya,
an3.35:5.1_2: so rāgo tathāgatassa pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo.
an3.35:6.2_0: api nu tassa gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā uppajjeyyuṁ dosajā pariḷāhā …pe…
an3.35:6.3_0: mohajā pariḷāhā kāyikā vā cetasikā vā yehi so mohajehi pariḷāhehi pariḍayhamāno dukkhaṁ sayeyyā”ti?
an3.35:7.1_1: gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā mohajehi pariḷāhehi pariḍayhamāno dukkhaṁ sayeyya,
an3.35:7.1_2: so moho tathāgatassa pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo.
an3.36:1.4_2: manasā duccaritaṁ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an3.36:1.5_0: Tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā nānābāhāsu gahetvā yamassa rañño dassenti:
an3.36:1.6_0: ‘ayaṁ, deva, puriso amatteyyo apetteyyo asāmañño abrahmañño, na kule jeṭṭhāpacāyī.
an3.36:2.1_0: Tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, yamo rājā paṭhamaṁ devadūtaṁ samanuyuñjati samanugāhati samanubhāsati:
an3.36:2.2_0: ‘ambho, purisa, na tvaṁ addasa manussesu paṭhamaṁ devadūtaṁ pātubhūtan’ti?
an3.36:3.2_1: na tvaṁ addasa manussesu itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā āsītikaṁ vā nāvutikaṁ vā vassasatikaṁ vā jātiyā jiṇṇaṁ
an3.36:3.2_2: gopānasivaṅkaṁ bhoggaṁ daṇḍaparāyaṇaṁ pavedhamānaṁ gacchantaṁ āturaṁ gatayobbanaṁ khaṇḍadantaṁ palitakesaṁ
an3.36:4.2_0: ‘ambho, purisa, tassa te viññussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi—
an3.36:4.3_0: ahampi khomhi jarādhammo jaraṁ anatīto, handāhaṁ kalyāṇaṁ karomi, kāyena vācāya manasā’ti?
an3.36:5.2_0: ‘ambho, purisa, pamādatāya na kalyāṇamakāsi kāyena vācāya manasā.
an3.36:5.3_0: Taggha tvaṁ, ambho purisa, tathā karissanti yathā taṁ pamattaṁ.
an3.36:5.4_0: Taṁ kho pana te etaṁ pāpakammaṁ neva mātarā kataṁ,
an3.36:5.5_0: atha kho tayāvetaṁ pāpakammaṁ kataṁ, tvaññevetassa vipākaṁ paṭisaṁvedissasī’ti.
an3.36:6.1_2: yamo rājā paṭhamaṁ devadūtaṁ samanuyuñjitvā samanugāhitvā samanubhāsitvā,
an3.36:6.2_0: ‘ambho purisa, na tvaṁ addasa manussesu dutiyaṁ devadūtaṁ pātubhūtan’ti?
an3.36:6.6_1: na tvaṁ addasa manussesu itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā ābādhikaṁ dukkhitaṁ bāḷhagilānaṁ,
an3.36:7.2_0: ‘ambho purisa, tassa te viññussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi:
an3.36:7.3_0: “ahampi khomhi byādhidhammo byādhiṁ anatīto, handāhaṁ kalyāṇaṁ karomi kāyena vācāya manasā”’ti?
an3.36:8.2_0: ‘ambho purisa, pamādatāya na kalyāṇamakāsi kāyena vācāya manasā.
an3.36:8.3_0: Taggha tvaṁ, ambho purisa, tathā karissanti yathā taṁ pamattaṁ.
an3.36:8.4_0: Taṁ kho pana te etaṁ pāpakammaṁ neva mātarā kataṁ,
an3.36:8.5_0: atha kho tayāvetaṁ pāpakammaṁ kataṁ. Tvaññevetassa vipākaṁ paṭisaṁvedissasī’ti.
an3.36:9.1_2: yamo rājā dutiyaṁ devadūtaṁ samanuyuñjitvā samanugāhitvā samanubhāsitvā,
an3.36:9.2_0: ‘ambho purisa, na tvaṁ addasa manussesu tatiyaṁ devadūtaṁ pātubhūtan’ti?
an3.36:10.2_1: na tvaṁ addasa manussesu itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā ekāhamataṁ vā dvīhamataṁ vā tīhamataṁ vā uddhumātakaṁ vinīlakaṁ vipubbakajātan’ti?
an3.36:11.2_0: ‘ambho purisa, tassa te viññussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi—
an3.36:11.3_0: ahampi khomhi maraṇadhammo maraṇaṁ anatīto, handāhaṁ kalyāṇaṁ karomi kāyena vācāya manasā’ti?
an3.36:12.2_0: ‘ambho purisa, pamādatāya na kalyāṇamakāsi kāyena vācāya manasā.
an3.36:12.3_0: Taggha tvaṁ, ambho purisa, tathā karissanti yathā taṁ pamattaṁ.
an3.36:12.4_0: Taṁ kho pana te etaṁ pāpakammaṁ neva mātarā kataṁ,
an3.36:12.5_0: atha kho tayāvetaṁ pāpakammaṁ kataṁ. Tvaññevetassa vipākaṁ paṭisaṁvedissasī’”ti.
an3.36:13.1_2: yamo rājā tatiyaṁ devadūtaṁ samanuyuñjitvā samanugāhitvā samanubhāsitvā tuṇhī hoti.
an3.36:13.2_0: Tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā pañcavidhabandhanaṁ nāma kāraṇaṁ karonti.
an3.36:13.4_0: So tattha dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vediyati,
an3.36:13.4_1: na ca tāva kālaṁ karoti yāva na taṁ pāpakammaṁ byantīhoti.
an3.36:14.1_0: Tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā saṁvesetvā kudhārīhi tacchanti.
an3.36:14.2_0: So tattha dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vediyati,
an3.36:14.2_1: na ca tāva kālaṁ karoti yāva na taṁ pāpakammaṁ byantīhoti.
an3.36:15.1_0: Tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā uddhampādaṁ adhosiraṁ gahetvā vāsīhi tacchanti …pe…
an3.36:15.2_2: nirayapālā rathe yojetvā ādittāya bhūmiyā sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya sārentipi paccāsārentipi …pe…
an3.36:15.3_2: nirayapālā mahantaṁ aṅgārapabbataṁ ādittaṁ sampajjalitaṁ sajotibhūtaṁ āropentipi oropentipi …pe…
an3.36:15.4_2: nirayapālā uddhampādaṁ adhosiraṁ gahetvā tattāya lohakumbhiyā pakkhipanti,
an3.36:15.5_0: So tattha pheṇuddehakaṁ paccamāno sakimpi uddhaṁ gacchati,
an3.36:15.6_0: So tattha dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vediyati,
an3.36:15.6_1: na ca tāva kālaṁ karoti yāva na taṁ pāpakammaṁ byantīhoti.
an3.36:18.2_0: ‘ye kira, bho, loke pāpakāni kammāni karonti te evarūpā vividhā kammakāraṇā karīyanti.
an3.36:18.3_1: tathāgato ca loke uppajjeyya arahaṁ sammāsambuddho,
an3.36:18.4_0: So ca me bhagavā dhammaṁ deseyya, tassa cāhaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ ājāneyyan’ti.
an3.36:18.5_2: na aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā sutvā evaṁ vadāmi,
an3.36:18.5_5: yadeva me sāmaṁ ñātaṁ sāmaṁ diṭṭhaṁ sāmaṁ viditaṁ tadevāhaṁ vadāmīti.
an3.37:1.1_0: “Aṭṭhamiyaṁ, bhikkhave, pakkhassa catunnaṁ mahārājānaṁ amaccā pārisajjā imaṁ lokaṁ anuvicaranti:
an3.37:1.2_0: ‘kacci bahū manussā manussesu matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino uposathaṁ upavasanti paṭijāgaronti puññāni karontī’ti.
an3.37:1.3_0: Cātuddasiṁ, bhikkhave, pakkhassa catunnaṁ mahārājānaṁ puttā imaṁ lokaṁ anuvicaranti:
an3.37:1.4_0: ‘kacci bahū manussā manussesu matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino uposathaṁ upavasanti paṭijāgaronti puññāni karontī’ti.
an3.37:1.5_0: Tadahu, bhikkhave, uposathe pannarase cattāro mahārājāno sāmaññeva imaṁ lokaṁ anuvicaranti:
an3.37:1.6_0: ‘kacci bahū manussā manussesu matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino uposathaṁ upavasanti paṭijāgaronti puññāni karontī’ti.
an3.37:2.1_2: appakā honti manussā manussesu matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino uposathaṁ upavasanti paṭijāgaronti puññāni karonti.
an3.37:2.2_2: cattāro mahārājāno devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ sudhammāya sabhāya sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ ārocenti:
an3.37:2.3_1: manussā manussesu matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino uposathaṁ upavasanti paṭijāgaronti puññāni karontī’ti.
an3.37:2.4_0: Tena kho, bhikkhave, devā tāvatiṁsā anattamanā honti:
an3.37:2.5_0: ‘dibbā vata, bho, kāyā parihāyissanti, paripūrissanti asurakāyā’ti.
an3.37:3.1_2: bahū honti manussā manussesu matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino uposathaṁ upavasanti paṭijāgaronti puññāni karonti.
an3.37:3.2_2: cattāro mahārājāno devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ sudhammāya sabhāya sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ ārocenti:
an3.37:3.3_1: manussā manussesu matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino uposathaṁ upavasanti paṭijāgaronti puññāni karontī’ti.
an3.37:3.4_0: Tena, bhikkhave, devā tāvatiṁsā attamanā honti:
an3.37:3.5_0: ‘dibbā vata bho kāyā paripūrissanti, parihāyissanti asurakāyā’ti.
an3.37:4.1_2: sakko devānamindo deve tāvatiṁse anunayamāno tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
an3.37:6.1_0: Sā kho panesā, bhikkhave, sakkena devānamindena gāthā duggītā na sugītā dubbhāsitā na subhāsitā.
an3.37:6.3_0: Sakko hi, bhikkhave, devānamindo avītarāgo avītadoso avītamoho.
an3.37:7.1_2: bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā brahmacariyo katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto,
an3.37:9.2_0: So hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho”ti.
an3.38:1.1_2: sakko devānamindo deve tāvatiṁse anunayamāno tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
an3.38:3.1_0: Sā kho panesā, bhikkhave, sakkena devānamindena gāthā duggītā na sugītā dubbhāsitā na subhāsitā.
an3.38:3.3_2: devānamindo aparimutto jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
an3.38:4.1_2: bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto,
an3.38:6.2_2: bhikkhu parimutto jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
an3.39:1.2_0: Mama sudaṁ, bhikkhave, pitu nivesane pokkharaṇiyo kāritā honti.
an3.39:1.3_0: Ekattha sudaṁ, bhikkhave, uppalaṁ vappati, ekattha padumaṁ, ekattha puṇḍarīkaṁ, yāvadeva mamatthāya.
an3.39:1.5_0: Rattindivaṁ kho pana me su taṁ, bhikkhave, setacchattaṁ dhārīyati:
an3.39:1.6_0: ‘mā naṁ phusi sītaṁ vā uṇhaṁ vā tiṇaṁ vā rajo vā ussāvo vā’ti.
an3.39:2.1_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, tayo pāsādā ahesuṁ—eko hemantiko, eko gimhiko, eko vassiko.
an3.39:2.2_2: vassike pāsāde vassike cattāro māse nippurisehi tūriyehi paricārayamāno na heṭṭhāpāsādaṁ orohāmi.
an3.39:2.3_2: aññesaṁ nivesane dāsakammakaraporisassa kaṇājakaṁ bhojanaṁ dīyati bilaṅgadutiyaṁ,
an3.39:3.1_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, evarūpāya iddhiyā samannāgatassa evarūpena ca sukhumālena etadahosi:
an3.39:3.2_0: ‘assutavā kho puthujjano attanā jarādhammo samāno jaraṁ anatīto paraṁ jiṇṇaṁ disvā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati attānaṁyeva atisitvā,
an3.39:3.3_0: Ahañceva kho pana jarādhammo samāno jaraṁ anatīto paraṁ jiṇṇaṁ disvā aṭṭīyeyyaṁ harāyeyyaṁ jiguccheyyaṁ na metaṁ assa patirūpan’ti.
an3.39:3.4_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhato yo yobbane yobbanamado so sabbaso pahīyi.
an3.39:4.1_0: Assutavā kho puthujjano attanā byādhidhammo samāno byādhiṁ anatīto paraṁ byādhitaṁ disvā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati attānaṁyeva atisitvā:
an3.39:4.2_1: ahañceva kho pana byādhidhammo samāno byādhiṁ anatīto paraṁ byādhikaṁ disvā aṭṭīyeyyaṁ harāyeyyaṁ jiguccheyyaṁ,
an3.39:4.3_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhato yo ārogye ārogyamado so sabbaso pahīyi.
an3.39:5.1_0: Assutavā kho puthujjano attanā maraṇadhammo samāno maraṇaṁ anatīto paraṁ mataṁ disvā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati attānaṁyeva atisitvā:
an3.39:5.2_2: ahaṁ ceva kho pana maraṇadhammo samāno maraṇaṁ anatīto paraṁ mataṁ disvā aṭṭīyeyyaṁ harāyeyyaṁ jiguccheyyaṁ,
an3.39:5.3_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhato yo jīvite jīvitamado so sabbaso pahīyīti.
an3.39:6.5_2: manasā duccaritaṁ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an3.39:6.8_2: manasā duccaritaṁ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an3.39:7.1_0: Yobbanamadamatto vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
an3.39:7.3_0: jīvitamadamatto vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattatīti.
an3.40:1.5_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an3.40:1.6_0: ‘na kho panāhaṁ cīvarahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
an3.40:1.7_0: Na piṇḍapātahetu, na senāsanahetu, na itibhavābhavahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
an3.40:1.8_0: Api ca khomhi otiṇṇo jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
an3.40:1.9_0: Appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethāti.
an3.40:1.10_0: Ahañceva kho pana yādisake kāme ohāya agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito tādisake vā kāme pariyeseyyaṁ tato vā pāpiṭṭhatare,
an3.40:1.12_0: ‘āraddhaṁ kho pana me vīriyaṁ bhavissati asallīnaṁ,
an3.40:1.13_0: So attānaṁyeva adhipatiṁ karitvā akusalaṁ pajahati,
an3.40:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an3.40:2.3_0: ‘na kho panāhaṁ cīvarahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
an3.40:2.4_0: Na piṇḍapātahetu, na senāsanahetu, na itibhavābhavahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
an3.40:2.5_0: Api ca khomhi otiṇṇo jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
an3.40:2.6_0: Appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
an3.40:2.7_0: Ahañceva kho pana evaṁ pabbajito samāno kāmavitakkaṁ vā vitakkeyyaṁ,
an3.40:2.8_0: Mahantasmiṁ kho pana lokasannivāse santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno.
an3.40:2.9_0: Te dūratopi passanti, āsannāpi na dissanti, cetasāpi cittaṁ pajānanti.
an3.40:2.11_1: imaṁ kulaputtaṁ saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
an3.40:2.12_0: devatāpi kho santi iddhimantiniyo dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduniyo.
an3.40:2.13_0: Tā dūratopi passanti, āsannāpi na dissanti, cetasāpi cittaṁ jānanti.
an3.40:2.15_1: imaṁ kulaputtaṁ saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
an3.40:2.17_0: ‘āraddhaṁ kho pana me vīriyaṁ bhavissati asallīnaṁ,
an3.40:2.18_0: So lokaṁyeva adhipatiṁ karitvā akusalaṁ pajahati,
an3.40:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an3.40:3.3_0: ‘na kho panāhaṁ cīvarahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
an3.40:3.4_0: Na piṇḍapātahetu, na senāsanahetu, na itibhavābhavahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
an3.40:3.5_0: Api ca khomhi otiṇṇo jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
an3.40:3.6_0: Appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethāti.
an3.40:3.7_0: Svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhīti.
an3.40:3.8_0: Santi kho pana me sabrahmacārī jānaṁ passaṁ viharanti.
an3.40:3.9_0: Ahañceva kho pana evaṁ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajito samāno kusīto vihareyyaṁ pamatto,
an3.40:3.11_0: ‘āraddhaṁ kho pana me vīriyaṁ bhavissati asallīnaṁ,
an3.40:3.12_0: So dhammaṁyeva adhipatiṁ karitvā akusalaṁ pajahati,
an3.41:1.1_0: “Tiṇṇaṁ, bhikkhave, sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati.
an3.41:1.3_0: Saddhāya, bhikkhave, sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati.
an3.41:1.4_0: Deyyadhammassa, bhikkhave, sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati.
an3.41:1.5_0: Dakkhiṇeyyānaṁ, bhikkhave, sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati.
an3.41:1.6_0: Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavatī”ti.
an3.42:1.3_2: vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṁ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṁvibhāgarato.
an3.42:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi ṭhānehi saddho pasanno veditabbo.
an3.43:1.1_0: “Tayo, bhikkhave, atthavase sampassamānena alameva paresaṁ dhammaṁ desetuṁ.
an3.43:1.3_0: Yo dhammaṁ deseti so atthappaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammappaṭisaṁvedī ca.
an3.43:1.4_0: Yo dhammaṁ suṇāti so atthappaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammappaṭisaṁvedī ca.
an3.43:1.5_0: Yo ceva dhammaṁ deseti yo ca dhammaṁ suṇāti ubho atthappaṭisaṁvedino ca honti dhammappaṭisaṁvedino ca.
an3.43:1.6_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo atthavase sampassamānena alameva paresaṁ dhammaṁ desetun”ti.
an3.44:1.3_0: Yo dhammaṁ deseti so atthappaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammappaṭisaṁvedī ca.
an3.44:1.4_0: Yo dhammaṁ suṇāti so atthappaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammappaṭisaṁvedī ca.
an3.44:1.5_0: Yo ceva dhammaṁ deseti yo ca dhammaṁ suṇāti ubho atthappaṭisaṁvedino ca honti dhammappaṭisaṁvedino ca.
an3.44:1.6_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi ṭhānehi kathā pavattinī hotī”ti.
an3.45:1.6_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi paṇḍitapaññattāni sappurisapaññattānīti.
an3.46:1.1_0: “Yaṁ, bhikkhave, sīlavanto pabbajitā gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā upanissāya viharanti.
an3.46:1.2_0: Tattha manussā tīhi ṭhānehi bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavanti.
an3.46:1.5_0: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, sīlavanto pabbajitā gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā upanissāya viharanti.
an3.46:1.6_0: Tattha manussā imehi tīhi ṭhānehi bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavantī”ti.
an3.47:1.3_0: Uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati.
an3.47:1.4_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi saṅkhatassa saṅkhatalakkhaṇānī”ti.
an3.47:2.3_0: Na uppādo paññāyati, na vayo paññāyati, na ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ paññāyati.
an3.47:2.4_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhatalakkhaṇānī”ti.
an3.48:1.1_0: “Himavantaṁ, bhikkhave, pabbatarājaṁ nissāya mahāsālā tīhi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhanti.
an3.48:1.3_0: Sākhāpattapalāsena vaḍḍhanti, tacapapaṭikāya vaḍḍhanti, pheggusārena vaḍḍhanti.
an3.48:1.4_0: Himavantaṁ, bhikkhave, pabbatarājaṁ nissāya mahāsālā imāhi tīhi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhanti.
an3.48:2.1_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, saddhaṁ kulapatiṁ nissāya anto jano tīhi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhati.
an3.48:2.3_0: Saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena vaḍḍhati, paññāya vaḍḍhati.
an3.48:2.4_0: Saddhaṁ, bhikkhave, kulapatiṁ nissāya anto jano imāhi tīhi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhatīti.
an3.49:1.3_0: Anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya ātappaṁ karaṇīyaṁ,
an3.49:1.3_1: anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya ātappaṁ karaṇīyaṁ,
an3.49:1.3_2: uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ adhivāsanāya ātappaṁ karaṇīyaṁ.
an3.49:1.4_0: Imehi tīhi, bhikkhave, ṭhānehi ātappaṁ karaṇīyaṁ.
an3.49:2.1_2: bhikkhu anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya ātappaṁ karoti,
an3.49:2.1_3: anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya ātappaṁ karoti,
an3.49:2.1_4: uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ adhivāsanāya ātappaṁ karoti.
an3.49:2.2_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ātāpī nipako sato sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
an3.50:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro visamanissito ca hoti, gahananissito ca hoti, balavanissito ca hoti.
an3.50:1.5_0: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro nadīviduggaṁ vā nissito hoti pabbatavisamaṁ vā.
an3.50:1.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro visamanissito hoti.
an3.50:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro tiṇagahanaṁ vā nissito hoti, rukkhagahanaṁ vā rodhaṁ vā mahāvanasaṇḍaṁ vā.
an3.50:2.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro gahananissito hoti.
an3.50:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro rājānaṁ vā rājamahāmattānaṁ vā nissito hoti.
an3.50:3.4_0: ‘sace maṁ koci kiñci vakkhati, ime me rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṁ bhaṇissantī’ti.
an3.50:3.5_0: Sace naṁ koci kiñci āha, tyāssa rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṁ bhaṇanti.
an3.50:3.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro balavanissito hoti.
an3.50:3.7_2: tīhi aṅgehi samannāgato mahācoro sandhimpi chindati,
an3.50:4.1_2: tīhi aṅgehi samannāgato pāpabhikkhu khataṁ upahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati,
an3.50:4.1_3: sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṁ,
an3.50:4.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu visamanissito ca hoti gahananissito ca balavanissito ca.
an3.50:5.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu visamanissito hoti.
an3.50:6.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato hoti.
an3.50:6.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu gahananissito hoti.
an3.50:7.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu rājānaṁ vā rājamahāmattānaṁ vā nissito hoti.
an3.50:7.4_0: ‘sace maṁ koci kiñci vakkhati, ime me rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṁ bhaṇissantī’ti.
an3.50:7.5_0: Sace naṁ koci kiñci āha, tyāssa rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṁ bhaṇanti.
an3.50:7.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu balavanissito hoti.
an3.50:7.7_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato pāpabhikkhu khataṁ upahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati,
an3.50:7.7_3: sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṁ,
an3.51:1.1_0: Atha kho dve brāhmaṇā jiṇṇā vuddhā mahallakā addhagatā vayoanuppattā vīsavassasatikā jātiyā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an3.51:1.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
an3.51:1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te brāhmaṇā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
an3.51:1.3_2: brāhmaṇā jiṇṇā vuddhā mahallakā addhagatā vayoanuppattā vīsavassasatikā jātiyā;
an3.51:1.5_0: Ovadatu no bhavaṁ gotamo, anusāsatu no bhavaṁ gotamo yaṁ amhākaṁ assa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
an3.51:2.1_0: “Taggha tumhe, brāhmaṇā, jiṇṇā vuddhā mahallakā addhagatā vayoanuppattā vīsavassasatikā jātiyā;
an3.51:2.3_0: Upanīyati kho ayaṁ, brāhmaṇā, loko jarāya byādhinā maraṇena.
an3.51:2.4_2: yo idha kāyena saṁyamo vācāya saṁyamo manasā saṁyamo,
an3.51:2.4_3: taṁ tassa petassa tāṇañca leṇañca dīpañca saraṇañca parāyaṇañcāti.
an3.52:1.1_0: Atha kho dve brāhmaṇā jiṇṇā vuddhā mahallakā addhagatā vayoanuppattā vīsavassasatikā jātiyā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an3.52:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te brāhmaṇā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
an3.52:1.2_2: brāhmaṇā jiṇṇā vuddhā mahallakā addhagatā vayoanuppattā vīsavassasatikā jātiyā;
an3.52:1.4_0: Ovadatu no bhavaṁ gotamo, anusāsatu no bhavaṁ gotamo yaṁ amhākaṁ assa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
an3.52:2.1_0: “Taggha tumhe, brāhmaṇā, jiṇṇā vuddhā mahallakā addhagatā vayoanuppattā vīsavassasatikā jātiyā;
an3.52:2.3_0: Āditto kho ayaṁ, brāhmaṇā, loko jarāya byādhinā maraṇena.
an3.52:2.4_2: yo idha kāyena saṁyamo vācāya saṁyamo manasā saṁyamo,
an3.52:2.4_3: taṁ tassa petassa tāṇañca leṇañca dīpañca saraṇañca parāyaṇañcāti.
an3.53:1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.53:1.1_2: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an3.53:1.2_0: “‘sandiṭṭhiko dhammo sandiṭṭhiko dhammo’ti, bho gotama, vuccati.
an3.53:1.3_2: sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī”ti?
an3.53:2.3_0: Ratto kho …pe… kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, manasā duccaritaṁ carati.
an3.53:2.4_0: Rāge pahīne neva kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, na vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, na manasā duccaritaṁ carati.
an3.53:2.7_0: Evampi kho, brāhmaṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti …pe….
an3.53:3.3_0: Evampi kho, brāhmaṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti …pe….
an3.53:4.3_1: sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī”ti.
an3.53:5.2_7: evamevaṁ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
an3.53:5.3_0: Esāhaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
an3.53:5.4_0: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an3.54:1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇaparibbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.54:1.1_2: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇaparibbājako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an3.54:1.2_0: “‘sandiṭṭhiko dhammo sandiṭṭhiko dhammo’ti, bho gotama, vuccati.
an3.54:1.3_2: sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī”ti?
an3.54:3.1_1: rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto kāyena duccaritaṁ carati,
an3.54:3.2_0: Rāge pahīne neva kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, na vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, na manasā duccaritaṁ carati.
an3.54:4.1_1: rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attatthampi yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti,
an3.54:4.3_0: Evampi kho, brāhmaṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti …pe….
an3.54:6.2_0: Mohe pahīne neva kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, na vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, na manasā duccaritaṁ carati.
an3.54:7.1_1: mohena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attatthampi yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti,
an3.54:7.3_1: sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī”ti.
an3.54:8.2_0: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an3.55:1.1_0: Atha kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.55:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an3.55:1.2_0: “‘sandiṭṭhikaṁ nibbānaṁ sandiṭṭhikaṁ nibbānan’ti, bho gotama, vuccati.
an3.55:1.3_2: sandiṭṭhikaṁ nibbānaṁ hoti akālikaṁ ehipassikaṁ opaneyyikaṁ paccattaṁ veditabbaṁ viññūhī”ti?
an3.55:2.3_0: Evampi kho, brāhmaṇa, sandiṭṭhikaṁ nibbānaṁ hoti.
an3.55:3.4_0: Evampi kho, brāhmaṇa, sandiṭṭhikaṁ nibbānaṁ hoti.
an3.55:4.2_1: sandiṭṭhikaṁ nibbānaṁ hoti akālikaṁ ehipassikaṁ opaneyyikaṁ paccattaṁ veditabbaṁ viññūhī”ti.
an3.55:5.2_0: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an3.56:1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇamahāsālo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
an3.56:1.1_1: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇamahāsālo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an3.56:1.2_2: pubbakānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ vuddhānaṁ mahallakānaṁ ācariyapācariyānaṁ bhāsamānānaṁ:
an3.56:1.3_0: ‘pubbe sudaṁ ayaṁ loko avīci maññe phuṭo ahosi manussehi, kukkuṭasaṁpātikā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo’ti.
an3.56:1.4_2: hetu ko paccayo yenetarahi manussānaṁ khayo hoti,
an3.56:2.2_0: Te adhammarāgarattā visamalobhābhibhūtā micchādhammaparetā tiṇhāni satthāni gahetvā aññamaññaṁ jīvitā voropenti,
an3.56:2.3_1: hetu ayaṁ paccayo yenetarahi manussānaṁ khayo hoti,
an3.56:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, etarahi manussā adhammarāgarattā visamalobhābhibhūtā micchādhammaparetā.
an3.56:3.2_0: Tesaṁ adhammarāgarattānaṁ visamalobhābhibhūtānaṁ micchādhammaparetānaṁ devo na sammādhāraṁ anuppavecchati.
an3.56:3.3_0: Tena dubbhikkhaṁ hoti dussassaṁ setaṭṭhikaṁ salākāvuttaṁ.
an3.56:3.5_1: hetu ayaṁ paccayo yenetarahi manussānaṁ khayo hoti,
an3.56:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, etarahi manussā adhammarāgarattā visamalobhābhibhūtā micchādhammaparetā.
an3.56:4.2_0: Tesaṁ adhammarāgarattānaṁ visamalobhābhibhūtānaṁ micchādhammaparetānaṁ yakkhā vāḷe amanusse ossajjanti,
an3.56:4.3_1: hetu ayaṁ paccayo yenetarahi manussānaṁ khayo hoti,
an3.56:5.2_0: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an3.57:1.1_0: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.57:1.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an3.57:1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an3.57:1.3_0: “sutaṁ metaṁ, bho gotama, samaṇo gotamo evamāha:
an3.57:1.5_0: mayhameva sāvakānaṁ dānaṁ dātabbaṁ, nāññesaṁ sāvakānaṁ dānaṁ dātabbaṁ;
an3.57:1.6_0: mayhameva dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ, nāññesaṁ dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ;
an3.57:1.7_0: mayhameva sāvakānaṁ dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ, nāññesaṁ sāvakānaṁ dinnaṁ mahapphalan’ti.
an3.57:1.8_0: Ye te, bho gotama, evamāhaṁsu ‘samaṇo gotamo evamāha:
an3.57:1.10_0: Mayhameva sāvakānaṁ dānaṁ dātabbaṁ, nāññesaṁ sāvakānaṁ dānaṁ dātabbaṁ.
an3.57:1.11_0: Mayhameva dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ, nāññesaṁ dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ.
an3.57:1.12_0: Mayhameva sāvakānaṁ dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ, nāññesaṁ sāvakānaṁ dinnaṁ mahapphalan”’ti.
an3.57:1.13_0: Kacci te bhoto gotamassa vuttavādino na ca bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ abhūtena abbhācikkhanti,
an3.57:1.13_2: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānupāto gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgacchati?
an3.57:2.5_0: na me te vuttavādino. Abbhācikkhanti ca pana maṁ asatā abhūtena.
an3.57:2.6_0: Yo kho, vaccha, paraṁ dānaṁ dadantaṁ vāreti so tiṇṇaṁ antarāyakaro hoti, tiṇṇaṁ pāripanthiko.
an3.57:2.8_2: pubbeva kho panassa attā khato ca hoti upahato ca.
an3.57:2.9_0: Yo kho, vaccha, paraṁ dānaṁ dadantaṁ vāreti so imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ antarāyakaro hoti, tiṇṇaṁ pāripanthiko.
an3.57:3.1_0: Ahaṁ kho pana, vaccha, evaṁ vadāmi:
an3.57:3.2_0: ‘ye hi te candanikāya vā oligalle vā pāṇā, tatrapi yo thālidhovanaṁ vā sarāvadhovanaṁ vā chaḍḍeti:
an3.57:3.3_0: “ye tattha pāṇā te tena yāpentū”’ti, tato nidānampāhaṁ, vaccha, puññassa āgamaṁ vadāmi.
an3.57:5.4_0: Iti pañcaṅgavippahīne pañcaṅgasamannāgate dinnaṁ mahapphalanti vadāmīti.
an3.58:1.1_0: Atha kho tikaṇṇo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ …pe…
an3.58:1.2_0: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho tikaṇṇo brāhmaṇo bhagavato sammukhā tevijjānaṁ sudaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati:
an3.58:2.1_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana, brāhmaṇa, brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇaṁ tevijjaṁ paññāpentī”ti?
an3.58:2.2_2: brāhmaṇo ubhato sujāto hoti mātito ca pitito ca,
an3.58:2.2_7: tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṁ sākkharappabhedānaṁ itihāsapañcamānaṁ, padako,
an3.58:2.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇaṁ tevijjaṁ paññāpentī”ti.
an3.58:3.1_2: aññathā ca pana ariyassa vinaye tevijjo hotī”ti.
an3.58:3.2_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana, bho gotama, ariyassa vinaye tevijjo hoti?
an3.58:3.3_0: Sādhu me bhavaṁ gotamo tathā dhammaṁ desetu yathā ariyassa vinaye tevijjo hotī”ti.
an3.58:3.4_0: “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
an3.58:3.5_0: “Evaṁ, bho”ti kho tikaṇṇo brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi.
an3.58:4.1_1: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an3.58:4.2_0: Vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an3.58:4.3_0: Pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno,
an3.58:4.3_1: sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti:
an3.58:4.3_2: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an3.58:4.4_0: Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā,
an3.58:4.4_1: pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an3.58:5.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
an3.58:5.2_1: seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi
an3.58:5.2_2: jātiyo tiṁsampi jātiyo cattārīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi,
an3.58:5.2_3: anekepi saṁvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṁvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe:
an3.58:5.2_4: ‘amutrāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto,
an3.58:5.2_6: Tatrāpāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto,
an3.58:5.2_8: Iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati.
an3.58:5.4_3: āloko uppanno yathā taṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
an3.58:6.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
an3.58:6.2_0: So dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
an3.58:6.2_3: manoduccaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṁ upavādakā micchādiṭṭhikā micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā,
an3.58:6.2_4: te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapannā.
an3.58:6.2_5: Ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā,
an3.58:6.2_7: manosucaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṁ anupavādakā sammādiṭṭhikā sammādiṭṭhikammasamādānā,
an3.58:6.2_8: te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapannā’ti.
an3.58:6.2_9: Iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
an3.58:6.4_3: āloko uppanno yathā taṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
an3.58:7.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
an3.58:7.4_0: Tassa evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati,
an3.58:7.6_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
an3.58:7.8_3: āloko uppanno yathā taṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharatoti.
an3.58:13.1_0: Evaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, ariyassa vinaye tevijjo hotī”ti.
an3.58:13.2_0: “Aññathā, bho gotama, brāhmaṇānaṁ tevijjo, aññathā ca pana ariyassa vinaye tevijjo hoti.
an3.58:13.3_0: Imassa ca pana, bho gotama, ariyassa vinaye tevijjassa brāhmaṇānaṁ tevijjo kalaṁ nāgghati soḷasiṁ.
an3.58:14.2_0: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.

an3.59:1.2_2: yañño vā saddhaṁ vā thālipāko vā deyyadhammaṁ vā,
an3.59:1.3_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana, brāhmaṇa, brāhmaṇā tevijjaṁ paññapentī”ti?

an3.59:4.2_2: iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati.

an3.59:5.2_0: So dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena …pe… yathākammūpage satte pajānāti.
an3.59:5.4_3: āloko uppanno yathā taṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
an3.59:6.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
an3.59:6.3_0: ‘ime āsavā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti …pe… ‘ayaṁ āsavanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
an3.59:6.4_0: Tassa evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati,
an3.59:6.6_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
an3.59:6.8_3: āloko uppanno yathā taṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharatoti.
an3.59:10.1_0: Evaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, ariyassa vinaye tevijjo hotī”ti.
