an3.91:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena saṅkavā nāma kosalānaṁ nigamo tadavasari.
an3.91:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena kassapagotto nāma bhikkhu saṅkavāyaṁ āvāsiko hoti.
an3.91:1.4_0: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā sikkhāpadapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya bhikkhū sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti.
an3.91:1.5_0: Atha kho kassapagottassa bhikkhuno bhagavati sikkhāpadapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya bhikkhū sandassente
an3.91:1.5_1: samādapente samuttejente sampahaṁsente ahudeva akkhanti ahu appaccayo:
an3.91:1.7_0: Atha kho bhagavā saṅkavāyaṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena rājagahaṁ tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
an3.91:1.8_0: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena rājagahaṁ tadavasari.
an3.91:2.1_0: Atha kho kassapagottassa bhikkhuno acirapakkantassa bhagavato ahudeva kukkuccaṁ ahu vippaṭisāro:
an3.91:2.2_0: “alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ;
an3.91:2.3_0: yassa me bhagavati sikkhāpadapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya bhikkhū sandassente samādapente samuttejente
an3.91:2.5_1: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato santike accayaṁ accayato deseyyan”ti.
an3.91:2.6_0: Atha kho kassapagotto bhikkhu senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena rājagahaṁ tena pakkāmi.
an3.91:2.7_0: Anupubbena yena rājagahaṁ yena gijjhakūṭo pabbato yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.91:2.7_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho kassapagotto bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an3.91:3.1_0: “Ekamidaṁ, bhante, samayaṁ bhagavā saṅkavāyaṁ viharati, saṅkavā nāma kosalānaṁ nigamo.
an3.91:3.2_1: bhagavā sikkhāpadapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya bhikkhū sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
an3.91:3.3_0: Tassa mayhaṁ bhagavati sikkhāpadapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya bhikkhū sandassente samādapente samuttejente
an3.91:3.5_0: Atha kho bhagavā saṅkavāyaṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena rājagahaṁ tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi. (…)
an3.91:3.6_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, acirapakkantassa bhagavato ahudeva kukkuccaṁ ahu vippaṭisāro:
an3.91:3.7_0: ‘alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ;
an3.91:3.8_0: yassa me bhagavati sikkhāpadapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya bhikkhū sandassente samādapente samuttejente
an3.91:3.10_1: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato santike accayaṁ accayato deseyyan’ti.
an3.91:3.11_1: accagamā yathābālaṁ yathāmūḷhaṁ yathāakusalaṁ yassa me bhagavati sikkhāpadapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya
an3.91:3.11_2: bhikkhū sandassente samādapente samuttejente sampahaṁsente ahudeva akkhanti ahu appaccayo:
an3.91:3.13_0: Tassa me, bhante, bhagavā accayaṁ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu, āyatiṁ saṁvarāyā”ti.
an3.91:4.1_2: yassa te mayi sikkhāpadapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya bhikkhū sandassente samādapente samuttejente sampahaṁsente ahudeva akkhanti ahu appaccayo:
an3.91:4.4_1: ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikaroti,
an3.91:5.1_1: bhikkhu hoti na sikkhākāmo na sikkhāsamādānassa vaṇṇavādī,
an3.91:5.1_2: ye caññe bhikkhū na sikkhākāmā te ca na sikkhāya samādapeti,
an3.91:5.1_3: ye caññe bhikkhū sikkhākāmā tesañca na vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇati bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena,
an3.91:5.3_0: Satthā hissa vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇatīti aññe naṁ bhikkhū bhajeyyuṁ,
an3.91:5.3_1: ye naṁ bhajeyyuṁ tyāssa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjeyyuṁ,
an3.91:5.3_2: yyāssa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjeyyuṁ tesaṁ taṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyāti.
an3.91:5.4_0: Tasmāhaṁ, kassapa, evarūpassa therassa bhikkhuno na vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇāmi.
an3.91:6.2_1: bhikkhu hoti na sikkhākāmo na sikkhāsamādānassa vaṇṇavādī,
an3.91:6.2_2: ye caññe bhikkhū na sikkhākāmā te ca na sikkhāya samādapeti,
an3.91:6.2_3: ye caññe bhikkhū sikkhākāmā tesañca na vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇati bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena,
an3.91:6.4_0: Satthā hissa vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇatīti aññe naṁ bhikkhū bhajeyyuṁ,
an3.91:6.4_1: ye naṁ bhajeyyuṁ tyāssa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjeyyuṁ,
an3.91:6.4_2: yyāssa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjeyyuṁ tesaṁ taṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyāti.
an3.91:6.5_0: Tasmāhaṁ, kassapa, evarūpassa navassa bhikkhuno na vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇāmi.
an3.91:7.1_2: ye caññe bhikkhū na sikkhākāmā te ca sikkhāya samādapeti,
an3.91:7.1_3: ye caññe bhikkhū sikkhākāmā tesañca vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇati bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena,
an3.91:7.3_0: Satthā hissa vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇatīti aññe naṁ bhikkhū bhajeyyuṁ,
an3.91:7.3_1: ye naṁ bhajeyyuṁ tyāssa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjeyyuṁ,
an3.91:7.3_2: yyāssa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjeyyuṁ tesaṁ taṁ assa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyāti.
an3.91:7.4_0: Tasmāhaṁ, kassapa, evarūpassa therassa bhikkhuno vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇāmi.
an3.91:8.1_0: Majjhimo cepi, kassapa, bhikkhu hoti sikkhākāmo …pe…
an3.91:8.2_2: ye caññe bhikkhū na sikkhākāmā te ca sikkhāya samādapeti,
an3.91:8.2_3: ye caññe bhikkhū sikkhākāmā tesañca vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇati bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena,
an3.91:8.4_0: Satthā hissa vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇatīti aññe naṁ bhikkhū bhajeyyuṁ,
an3.91:8.4_1: ye naṁ bhajeyyuṁ tyāssa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjeyyuṁ,
an3.91:8.4_2: yyāssa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjeyyuṁ tesaṁ taṁ assa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyāti.
an3.91:8.5_0: Tasmāhaṁ, kassapa, evarūpassa navassa bhikkhuno vaṇṇaṁ bhaṇāmī”ti.
an3.92:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, kassako gahapati sīghaṁ sīghaṁ khettaṁ sukaṭṭhaṁ karoti sumatikataṁ.
an3.92:1.4_0: Sīghaṁ sīghaṁ khettaṁ sukaṭṭhaṁ karitvā sumatikataṁ sīghaṁ sīghaṁ bījāni patiṭṭhāpeti.
an3.92:1.5_0: Sīghaṁ sīghaṁ bījāni patiṭṭhāpetvā sīghaṁ sīghaṁ udakaṁ abhinetipi apanetipi.
an3.92:1.6_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi kassakassa gahapatissa accāyikāni karaṇīyāni.
an3.92:1.7_0: Tassa kho taṁ, bhikkhave, kassakassa gahapatissa natthi sā iddhi vā ānubhāvo vā:
an3.92:1.8_0: ‘ajjeva me dhaññāni jāyantu, sveva gabbhīni hontu, uttarasveva paccantū’ti.
an3.92:1.9_2: hoti so samayo yaṁ tassa kassakassa gahapatissa tāni dhaññāni utupariṇāmīni jāyantipi gabbhīnipi honti paccantipi.
an3.92:2.1_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tīṇimāni bhikkhussa accāyikāni karaṇīyāni.
an3.92:2.4_0: imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi bhikkhussa accāyikāni karaṇīyāni.
an3.92:2.5_0: Tassa kho taṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno natthi sā iddhi vā ānubhāvo vā:
an3.92:2.6_0: ‘ajjeva me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccatu sve vā uttarasve vā’ti.
an3.92:2.7_2: hoti so samayo yaṁ tassa bhikkhuno adhisīlampi sikkhato adhicittampi sikkhato adhipaññampi sikkhato anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccati.
an3.93:2.2_0: Idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā cīvarapavivekasmiṁ paññāpenti.
an3.93:3.1_0: Tatridaṁ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā piṇḍapātapavivekasmiṁ paññāpenti.
an3.93:3.3_0: Idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā piṇḍapātapavivekasmiṁ paññāpenti.
an3.93:4.1_2: aññatitthiyā paribbājakā senāsanapavivekasmiṁ paññāpenti araññaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ susānaṁ vanapatthaṁ abbhokāsaṁ palālapuñjaṁ bhusāgāraṁ.
an3.93:4.2_0: Idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā senāsanapavivekasmiṁ paññāpenti.
an3.93:4.3_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi aññatitthiyā paribbājakā pavivekāni paññāpenti.
an3.93:5.1_0: Tīṇi kho panimāni, bhikkhave, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye bhikkhuno pavivekāni.
an3.93:5.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā ca hoti, dussīlyañcassa pahīnaṁ hoti, tena ca vivitto hoti;
an3.93:5.4_0: sammādiṭṭhiko ca hoti, micchādiṭṭhi cassa pahīnā hoti, tāya ca vivitto hoti;
an3.93:5.5_0: khīṇāsavo ca hoti, āsavā cassa pahīnā honti, tehi ca vivitto hoti.
an3.93:5.6_0: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, dussīlyañcassa pahīnaṁ hoti, tena ca vivitto hoti;
an3.93:5.7_0: sammādiṭṭhiko ca hoti, micchādiṭṭhi cassa pahīnā hoti, tāya ca vivitto hoti;
an3.93:5.8_0: khīṇāsavo ca hoti, āsavā cassa pahīnā honti, tehi ca vivitto hoti.
an3.93:5.9_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu aggappatto sārappatto suddho sāre patiṭṭhito’.
an3.93:6.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, kassakassa gahapatissa sampannaṁ sālikkhettaṁ.
an3.93:6.2_0: Tamenaṁ kassako gahapati sīghaṁ sīghaṁ lavāpeyya.
an3.93:6.3_0: Sīghaṁ sīghaṁ lavāpetvā sīghaṁ sīghaṁ saṅgharāpeyya.
an3.93:6.4_0: Sīghaṁ sīghaṁ saṅgharāpetvā sīghaṁ sīghaṁ ubbahāpeyya.
an3.93:6.5_0: Sīghaṁ sīghaṁ ubbahāpetvā sīghaṁ sīghaṁ puñjaṁ kārāpeyya.
an3.93:6.6_0: Sīghaṁ sīghaṁ puñjaṁ kārāpetvā sīghaṁ sīghaṁ maddāpeyya.
an3.93:6.7_0: Sīghaṁ sīghaṁ maddāpetvā sīghaṁ sīghaṁ palālāni uddharāpeyya.
an3.93:6.8_0: Sīghaṁ sīghaṁ palālāni uddharāpetvā sīghaṁ sīghaṁ bhusikaṁ uddharāpeyya.
an3.93:6.9_0: Sīghaṁ sīghaṁ bhusikaṁ uddharāpetvā sīghaṁ sīghaṁ opunāpeyya.
an3.93:6.10_0: Sīghaṁ sīghaṁ opunāpetvā sīghaṁ sīghaṁ atiharāpeyya.
an3.93:6.11_0: Sīghaṁ sīghaṁ atiharāpetvā sīghaṁ sīghaṁ koṭṭāpeyya.
an3.93:6.12_0: Sīghaṁ sīghaṁ koṭṭāpetvā sīghaṁ sīghaṁ thusāni uddharāpeyya.
an3.93:6.13_2: kassakassa gahapatissa dhaññāni aggappattāni sārappattāni suddhāni sāre patiṭṭhitāni.
an3.93:7.2_0: sammādiṭṭhiko ca hoti, micchādiṭṭhi cassa pahīnā hoti, tāya ca vivitto hoti;
an3.93:7.3_0: khīṇāsavo ca hoti, āsavā cassa pahīnā honti, tehi ca vivitto hoti.
an3.93:7.4_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu aggappatto sārappatto suddho sāre patiṭṭhito’”ti.
an3.94:1.1_2: saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalāhake deve ādicco nabhaṁ abbhussakkamāno sabbaṁ ākāsagataṁ tamagataṁ abhivihacca bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca.
an3.94:2.1_2: yato ariyasāvakassa virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ uppajjati,
an3.94:3.1_0: Athāparaṁ dvīhi dhammehi niyyāti abhijjhāya ca byāpādena ca.
an3.94:3.2_0: So vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an3.94:3.3_3: natthi taṁ saṁyojanaṁ yena saṁyojanena saṁyutto ariyasāvako puna imaṁ lokaṁ āgaccheyyā”ti.
an3.95:1.3_0: Aggavatī parisā, vaggā parisā, samaggā parisā.
an3.95:2.2_2: yassaṁ parisāyaṁ therā bhikkhū na bāhulikā honti na sāthalikā,
an3.95:2.2_4: vīriyaṁ ārabhanti appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya,
an3.95:2.3_0: Sāpi hoti na bāhulikā na sāthalikā okkamane nikkhittadhurā paviveke pubbaṅgamā,
an3.95:2.3_1: vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an3.95:3.2_2: yassaṁ parisāyaṁ bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṁ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti,
an3.95:4.2_2: yassaṁ parisāyaṁ bhikkhū samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharanti,
an3.95:5.1_2: samaye bhikkhū samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharanti, bahuṁ,
an3.95:5.2_0: Brahmaṁ, bhikkhave, vihāraṁ tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhū viharanti, yadidaṁ muditāya cetovimuttiyā.
an3.95:6.1_2: uparipabbate thullaphusitake deve vassante taṁ udakaṁ yathāninnaṁ pavattamānaṁ pabbatakandarapadarasākhā paripūreti,
an3.95:7.1_2: yasmiṁ samaye bhikkhū samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharanti, bahuṁ,
an3.95:7.2_0: Brahmaṁ, bhikkhave, vihāraṁ tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhū viharanti, yadidaṁ muditāya cetovimuttiyā.
an3.96:1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an3.96:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño bhadro assājānīyo vaṇṇasampanno ca hoti balasampanno ca javasampanno ca.
an3.96:1.4_2: tīhi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an3.96:1.5_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an3.96:1.7_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaṇṇasampanno ca hoti balasampanno ca javasampanno ca.
an3.96:2.2_3: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī,
an3.96:2.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaṇṇasampanno hoti.
an3.96:3.2_2: bhikkhu āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadāya thāmavā
an3.96:3.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu balasampanno hoti.
an3.96:4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti;
an3.96:4.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu javasampanno hoti.
an3.96:4.7_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā”ti.

an3.101:1.3_0: Tasmiṁ pahīne tasmiṁ byantīkate santi jātarūpassa majjhimasahagatā upakkilesā sukhumasakkharā thūlavālukā.
an3.101:1.4_0: Tamenaṁ paṁsudhovako vā paṁsudhovakantevāsī vā dhovati sandhovati niddhovati.
an3.101:1.5_0: Tasmiṁ pahīne tasmiṁ byantīkate santi jātarūpassa sukhumasahagatā upakkilesā sukhumavālukā kāḷajallikā.
an3.101:1.6_0: Tamenaṁ paṁsudhovako vā paṁsudhovakantevāsī vā dhovati sandhovati niddhovati.
an3.101:1.7_0: Tasmiṁ pahīne tasmiṁ byantīkate athāparaṁ suvaṇṇasikatāvasissanti.

an3.101:1.9_1: na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyaṁ,
an3.101:1.10_2: samayo yaṁ suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṁ jātarūpaṁ dhamati sandhamati niddhamati.
an3.101:1.11_0: Taṁ hoti jātarūpaṁ dhantaṁ sandhantaṁ niddhantaṁ niddhantakasāvaṁ,
an3.101:1.12_0: Yassā yassā ca pilandhanavikatiyā ākaṅkhati—yadi paṭṭikāya,
an3.101:2.1_2: santi adhicittamanuyuttassa bhikkhuno oḷārikā upakkilesā kāyaduccaritaṁ vacīduccaritaṁ manoduccaritaṁ,

an3.101:2.3_2: tamenaṁ sacetaso bhikkhu dabbajātiko pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.

an3.101:2.5_0: So hoti samādhi na ceva santo na ca paṇīto nappaṭippassaddhaladdho na ekodibhāvādhigato sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato.

an3.101:6.1_5: “amutrāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto,
an3.101:6.1_7: tatrāpāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto,
an3.101:6.1_9: iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussareyyan’ti,
an3.101:6.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane.
an3.101:7.1_1: ‘dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passeyyaṁ cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
an3.101:7.1_3: “ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena samannāgatā manoduccaritena samannāgatā
an3.101:7.1_5: te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapannā;
an3.101:7.1_6: ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena samannāgatā manosucaritena samannāgatā
an3.101:7.1_8: te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapannā”ti,
an3.101:7.1_9: iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passeyyaṁ cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
an3.101:7.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane.
an3.101:8.1_1: ‘āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyan’ti,
an3.101:8.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”ti.
an3.102:1.1_0: “Adhicittamanuyuttena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā tīṇi nimittāni kālena kālaṁ manasi kātabbāni—
an3.102:1.3_2: adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekantaṁ samādhinimittaṁyeva manasi kareyya,
an3.102:1.4_2: adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekantaṁ paggahanimittaṁyeva manasi kareyya,
an3.102:1.5_2: adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekantaṁ upekkhānimittaṁyeva manasi kareyya,
an3.102:1.5_3: ṭhānaṁ taṁ cittaṁ na sammā samādhiyeyya āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an3.102:1.6_2: adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ samādhinimittaṁ manasi karoti,
an3.102:1.6_5: taṁ hoti cittaṁ muduñca kammaniyañca pabhassarañca,
an3.102:2.1_2: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā ukkaṁ bandheyya,
an3.102:2.1_4: ukkāmukhaṁ ālimpetvā saṇḍāsena jātarūpaṁ gahetvā ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyya,
an3.102:2.2_2: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṁ jātarūpaṁ ekantaṁ abhidhameyya,
an3.102:2.3_2: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṁ jātarūpaṁ ekantaṁ udakena paripphoseyya,
an3.102:2.4_2: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṁ jātarūpaṁ ekantaṁ ajjhupekkheyya,
an3.102:2.4_3: ṭhānaṁ taṁ jātarūpaṁ na sammā paripākaṁ gaccheyya.
an3.102:2.5_2: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṁ jātarūpaṁ kālena kālaṁ abhidhamati,
an3.102:2.5_5: taṁ hoti jātarūpaṁ muduñca kammaniyañca pabhassarañca,
an3.102:2.6_0: Yassā yassā ca pilandhanavikatiyā ākaṅkhati—yadi paṭṭikāya,
an3.102:3.1_2: adhicittamanuyuttena bhikkhunā tīṇi nimittāni kālena kālaṁ manasi kātabbāni—
an3.102:3.3_2: adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekantaṁ samādhinimittaṁyeva manasi kareyya,
an3.102:3.4_2: adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekantaṁ paggahanimittaṁyeva manasi kareyya,
an3.102:3.5_2: adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekantaṁ upekkhānimittaṁyeva manasi kareyya,
an3.102:3.5_3: ṭhānaṁ taṁ cittaṁ na sammā samādhiyeyya āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an3.102:3.6_2: adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ samādhinimittaṁ manasi karoti,
an3.102:3.6_5: taṁ hoti cittaṁ muduñca kammaniyañca pabhassarañca,
an3.102:3.7_0: Yassa yassa ca abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṁ abhininnāmeti abhiññāsacchikiriyāya,
an3.102:3.7_1: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane.
an3.102:4.6_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”ti.
an3.103:1.1_0: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
an3.103:1.2_0: ‘ko nu kho loke assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇan’ti?
an3.103:1.4_0: ‘yaṁ kho lokaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ loke assādo.
an3.103:1.5_0: Yaṁ loko anicco dukkho vipariṇāmadhammo, ayaṁ loke ādīnavo.
an3.103:1.6_0: Yo loke chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ loke nissaraṇan’ti.
an3.103:1.7_2: evaṁ lokassa assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nābbhaññāsiṁ,
an3.103:1.7_5: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṁ.
an3.103:1.8_2: evaṁ lokassa assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, athāhaṁ,
an3.103:1.8_4: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṁ.
an3.103:1.10_0: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
an3.104:1.1_0: “Lokassāhaṁ, bhikkhave, assādapariyesanaṁ acariṁ. Yo loke assādo tadajjhagamaṁ.
an3.104:1.2_0: Yāvatako loke assādo, paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
an3.104:1.3_0: Lokassāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ādīnavapariyesanaṁ acariṁ. Yo loke ādīnavo tadajjhagamaṁ.
an3.104:1.4_0: Yāvatako loke ādīnavo, paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
an3.104:1.5_0: Lokassāhaṁ, bhikkhave, nissaraṇapariyesanaṁ acariṁ. Yaṁ loke nissaraṇaṁ tadajjhagamaṁ.
an3.104:1.6_0: Yāvatakaṁ loke nissaraṇaṁ, paññāya me taṁ sudiṭṭhaṁ.
an3.104:1.7_2: lokassa assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nābbhaññāsiṁ,
an3.104:1.7_5: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṁ.
an3.104:1.8_2: lokassa assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, athāhaṁ,
an3.104:1.8_4: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṁ.
an3.104:1.10_0: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
an3.105:1.1_0: “No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, loke assādo abhavissa, nayidaṁ sattā loke sārajjeyyuṁ.
an3.105:1.2_0: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi loke assādo, tasmā sattā loke sārajjanti.
an3.105:1.3_0: No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, loke ādīnavo abhavissa, nayidaṁ sattā loke nibbindeyyuṁ.
an3.105:1.4_0: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi loke ādīnavo, tasmā sattā loke nibbindanti.
an3.105:1.5_0: No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, loke nissaraṇaṁ abhavissa, nayidaṁ sattā lokamhā nissareyyuṁ.
an3.105:1.6_0: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi loke nissaraṇaṁ, tasmā sattā lokamhā nissaranti.
an3.105:1.7_2: sattā lokassa assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nābbhaññāsuṁ,
an3.105:1.7_5: sattā sadevakā lokā samārakā sabrahmakā sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya nissaṭā visaṁyuttā vippamuttā vimariyādīkatena cetasā vihariṁsu.
an3.105:1.8_2: sattā lokassa assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsuṁ, atha,
an3.105:1.8_4: sattā sadevakā lokā samārakā sabrahmakā sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya nissaṭā visaṁyuttā vippamuttā vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharantī”ti.
an3.106:1.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā lokassa assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti,
an3.106:1.2_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā,
an3.106:1.2_3: na ca pana te āyasmanto sāmaññatthaṁ vā brahmaññatthaṁ vā diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti.
an3.106:1.3_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā lokassa assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti,
an3.106:1.4_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā,
an3.106:1.4_3: te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
an3.107:1.2_0: Ummattakamidaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yadidaṁ naccaṁ.
an3.107:1.3_0: Komārakamidaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yadidaṁ ativelaṁ dantavidaṁsakahasitaṁ.
an3.107:1.4_4: alaṁ vo dhammappamoditānaṁ sataṁ sitaṁ sitamattāyā”ti.
an3.108:1.6_0: Imesaṁ, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ paṭisevanāya natthi tittī”ti.
an3.109:1.1_0: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.109:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an3.109:1.3_0: Tassa arakkhitakāyakammantassa arakkhitavacīkammantassa arakkhitamanokammantassa kāyakammampi avassutaṁ hoti,
an3.109:1.4_0: Tassa avassutakāyakammantassa avassutavacīkammantassa avassutamanokammantassa kāyakammampi pūtikaṁ hoti,
an3.109:1.5_0: Tassa pūtikāyakammantassa pūtivacīkammantassa pūtimanokammantassa na bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti,
an3.109:2.2_0: kūṭampi avassutaṁ hoti, gopānasiyopi avassutā honti, bhittipi avassutā hoti;
an3.109:2.3_0: kūṭampi pūtikaṁ hoti, gopānasiyopi pūtikā honti, bhittipi pūtikā hoti.
an3.109:3.2_0: Tassa arakkhitakāyakammantassa arakkhitavacīkammantassa arakkhitamanokammantassa kāyakammampi avassutaṁ hoti,
an3.109:3.3_0: Tassa avassutakāyakammantassa avassutavacīkammantassa avassutamanokammantassa kāyakammampi pūtikaṁ hoti,
an3.109:3.4_0: Tassa pūtikāyakammantassa pūtivacīkammantassa pūtimanokammantassa na bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti,
an3.109:4.2_0: Tassa rakkhitakāyakammantassa rakkhitavacīkammantassa rakkhitamanokammantassa kāyakammampi anavassutaṁ hoti,
an3.109:4.3_0: Tassa anavassutakāyakammantassa anavassutavacīkammantassa anavassutamanokammantassa kāyakammampi apūtikaṁ hoti,
an3.109:4.4_0: Tassa apūtikāyakammantassa apūtivacīkammantassa apūtimanokammantassa bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti,
an3.109:5.2_0: kūṭampi anavassutaṁ hoti, gopānasiyopi anavassutā honti, bhittipi anavassutā hoti;
an3.109:5.3_0: kūṭampi apūtikaṁ hoti, gopānasiyopi apūtikā honti, bhittipi apūtikā hoti.
an3.109:6.2_0: Tassa rakkhitakāyakammantassa rakkhitavacīkammantassa rakkhitamanokammantassa kāyakammampi anavassutaṁ hoti,
an3.109:6.3_0: Tassa anavassutakāyakammantassa anavassutavacīkammantassa anavassutamanokammantassa kāyakammampi apūtikaṁ hoti,
an3.109:6.4_0: Tassa apūtikāyakammantassa apūtivacīkammantassa apūtimanokammantassa bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti,
an3.110:1.1_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an3.110:1.3_0: Tassa byāpannakāyakammantassa byāpannavacīkammantassa byāpannamanokammantassa na bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti,
an3.110:1.6_0: Tassa byāpannakāyakammantassa byāpannavacīkammantassa byāpannamanokammantassa na bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti,
an3.110:2.2_0: Tassa abyāpannakāyakammantassa abyāpannavacīkammantassa abyāpannamanokammantassa bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti,
an3.111:1.4_3: taṁ kammaṁ akusalaṁ taṁ kammaṁ sāvajjaṁ taṁ kammaṁ dukkhavipākaṁ,
an3.111:1.5_3: taṁ kammaṁ akusalaṁ taṁ kammaṁ sāvajjaṁ taṁ kammaṁ dukkhavipākaṁ,
an3.111:1.6_3: taṁ kammaṁ akusalaṁ taṁ kammaṁ sāvajjaṁ taṁ kammaṁ dukkhavipākaṁ,
an3.111:1.7_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi nidānāni kammānaṁ samudayāya.
an3.111:2.4_3: taṁ kammaṁ kusalaṁ taṁ kammaṁ anavajjaṁ taṁ kammaṁ sukhavipākaṁ,
an3.111:2.5_3: taṁ kammaṁ kusalaṁ taṁ kammaṁ anavajjaṁ taṁ kammaṁ sukhavipākaṁ,
an3.111:2.6_3: taṁ kammaṁ kusalaṁ taṁ kammaṁ anavajjaṁ taṁ kammaṁ sukhavipākaṁ,
an3.111:2.7_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi nidānāni kammānaṁ samudayāyā”ti.
an3.112:1.3_0: Atīte, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati;
an3.112:1.4_0: anāgate, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati;
an3.112:1.5_0: paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati.
an3.112:1.6_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati?
an3.112:1.7_0: Atīte, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti.
an3.112:1.8_0: Tassa atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato chando jāyati.
an3.112:1.10_0: Etamahaṁ, bhikkhave, saṁyojanaṁ vadāmi yo cetaso sārāgo.
an3.112:1.11_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati.
an3.112:2.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati?
an3.112:2.2_0: Anāgate, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti.
an3.112:2.3_0: Tassa anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato chando jāyati.
an3.112:2.5_0: Etamahaṁ, bhikkhave, saṁyojanaṁ vadāmi yo cetaso sārāgo.
an3.112:2.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati.
an3.112:3.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati?
an3.112:3.2_0: Paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti.
an3.112:3.3_0: Tassa paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato chando jāyati.
an3.112:3.5_0: Etamahaṁ, bhikkhave, saṁyojanaṁ vadāmi yo cetaso sārāgo.
an3.112:3.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati.
an3.112:3.7_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi nidānāni kammānaṁ samudayāya.
an3.112:4.3_0: Atīte, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati;
an3.112:4.4_0: anāgate, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati;
an3.112:4.5_0: paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati.
an3.112:5.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati?
an3.112:5.2_0: Atītānaṁ, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniyānaṁ dhammānaṁ āyatiṁ vipākaṁ pajānāti.
an3.112:5.4_0: Tadabhinivattetvā cetasā abhinivijjhitvā paññāya ativijjha passati.
an3.112:5.5_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati.
an3.112:6.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati?
an3.112:6.2_0: Anāgatānaṁ, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniyānaṁ dhammānaṁ āyatiṁ vipākaṁ pajānāti.
an3.112:6.4_0: Tadabhinivattetvā cetasā abhinivijjhitvā paññāya ativijjha passati.
an3.112:6.5_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati.
an3.112:7.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati?
an3.112:7.2_4: tadabhinivattetvā cetasā abhinivijjhitvā paññāya ativijjha passati.
an3.112:7.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati.
an3.112:7.4_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi nidānāni kammānaṁ samudayāyā”ti.
an3.113:1.4_0: yo ca suddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carantaṁ amūlakena abrahmacariyena anuddhaṁseti,
an3.113:1.5_0: yo cāyaṁ evaṁvādī evaṁdiṭṭhi: ‘natthi kāmesu doso’ti, so tāya kāmesu pātabyataṁ āpajjati.
an3.113:1.6_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo āpāyikā nerayikā idamappahāyā”ti.
an3.114:1.3_3: tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desetā puggalo dullabho lokasmiṁ,
an3.114:1.4_0: Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmin”ti.
an3.115:1.5_2: ekacco puggalo uddhato hoti unnaḷo capalo mukharo vikiṇṇavāco muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo.
an3.115:2.2_2: ekacco puggalo anuddhato hoti anunnaḷo acapalo amukharo avikiṇṇavāco upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṁvutindriyo.
an3.115:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṁ hoti khīṇāsavo.
an3.115:3.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an3.116:1.3_2: ekacco puggalo sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā
an3.116:1.4_0: So tadassādeti taṁ nikāmeti tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati,
an3.116:1.4_1: tatra ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an3.116:1.5_0: Ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṁ, bhikkhave, devānaṁ vīsati kappasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṁ.
an3.116:1.6_0: Tattha puthujjano yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā nirayampi
an3.116:1.7_0: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.
an3.116:1.8_2: viseso ayaṁ adhippayāso idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanena,
an3.116:2.1_2: idhekacco puggalo sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an3.116:2.2_0: So tadassādeti taṁ nikāmeti tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati,
an3.116:2.2_1: tatra ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno viññāṇañcāyatanūpagānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an3.116:2.3_0: Viññāṇañcāyatanūpagānaṁ, bhikkhave, devānaṁ cattārīsaṁ kappasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṁ.

an3.116:2.5_0: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.

an3.116:3.3_0: Ākiñcaññāyatanūpagānaṁ, bhikkhave, devānaṁ saṭṭhi kappasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṁ.

an3.116:3.5_0: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.

an3.116:3.7_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.

an3.121:3.2_10: yathā ca pahīnassa kāmacchandassa āyatiṁ anuppādo hoti,
an3.121:3.3_4: yathā ca anuppannassa byāpādassa uppādo hoti,
an3.121:3.3_6: yathā ca uppannassa byāpādassa pahānaṁ hoti,
an3.121:3.3_8: yathā ca pahīnassa byāpādassa āyatiṁ anuppādo hoti,
an3.121:3.4_4: yathā ca anuppannassa thinamiddhassa uppādo hoti,
an3.121:3.4_6: yathā ca uppannassa thinamiddhassa pahānaṁ hoti,
an3.121:3.4_8: yathā ca pahīnassa thinamiddhassa āyatiṁ anuppādo hoti,

an3.122:3.2_2: bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an3.123:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kusinārāyaṁ viharati baliharaṇe vanasaṇḍe.
an3.123:2.1_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā upanissāya viharati.
an3.123:2.2_0: Tamenaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā upasaṅkamitvā svātanāya bhattena nimanteti.
an3.123:2.4_0: So tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena tassa gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamati;
an3.123:2.5_0: Tamenaṁ so gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappeti sampavāreti.
an3.123:3.2_0: ‘sādhu vata myāyaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappeti sampavāretī’ti.
an3.123:3.4_0: ‘aho vata māyaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā āyatimpi evarūpena paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappeyya sampavāreyyā’ti.
an3.123:3.5_0: So taṁ piṇḍapātaṁ gathito mucchito ajjhosanno anādīnavadassāvī anissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati.
an3.123:3.6_0: So tattha kāmavitakkampi vitakketi, byāpādavitakkampi vitakketi, vihiṁsāvitakkampi vitakketi.
an3.123:3.7_0: Evarūpassāhaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dinnaṁ na mahapphalanti vadāmi.
an3.123:4.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā upanissāya viharati.
an3.123:4.2_0: Tamenaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā upasaṅkamitvā svātanāya bhattena nimanteti.
an3.123:4.4_0: So tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena tassa gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamati;
an3.123:4.5_0: Tamenaṁ so gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappeti sampavāreti.
an3.123:5.2_0: ‘sādhu vata myāyaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappeti sampavāretī’ti.
an3.123:5.4_0: ‘aho vata māyaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā āyatimpi evarūpena paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappeyya sampavāreyyā’ti.
an3.123:5.5_0: So taṁ piṇḍapātaṁ agathito amucchito anajjhosanno ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati.
an3.123:5.6_0: So tattha nekkhammavitakkampi vitakketi, abyāpādavitakkampi vitakketi, avihiṁsāvitakkampi vitakketi.
an3.123:5.7_0: Evarūpassāhaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dinnaṁ mahapphalanti vadāmi.
an3.124:1.1_2: disāyaṁ bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṁ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti,
an3.124:1.3_0: ‘addhā te āyasmanto tayo dhamme pajahiṁsu, tayo dhamme bahulamakaṁsu.
an3.124:1.10_2: disāyaṁ bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṁ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti,
an3.124:1.12_0: ‘addhā te āyasmanto ime tayo dhamme pajahiṁsu, ime tayo dhamme bahulamakaṁsu’.
an3.124:2.1_2: disāyaṁ bhikkhū samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharanti,
an3.124:2.3_0: ‘addhā te āyasmanto tayo dhamme pajahiṁsu, tayo dhamme bahulamakaṁsu.
an3.124:2.10_2: disāyaṁ bhikkhū samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharanti,
an3.124:2.12_0: ‘addhā te āyasmanto ime tayo dhamme pajahiṁsu, ime tayo dhamme bahulamakaṁsū’”ti.
an3.125:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati gotamake cetiye.
an3.125:2.2_0: Sanidānāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desemi, no anidānaṁ.
an3.125:2.3_0: Sappāṭihāriyāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desemi, no appāṭihāriyaṁ.
an3.125:2.5_0: Alañca pana vo, bhikkhave, tuṭṭhiyā, alaṁ attamanatāya, alaṁ somanassāya:
an3.125:3.2_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
an3.125:3.3_0: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne sahassī lokadhātu akampitthāti.
an3.126:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṁ caramāno yena kapilavatthu tadavasari.
an3.126:1.2_0: Assosi kho mahānāmo sakko: “bhagavā kira kapilavatthuṁ anuppatto”ti.
an3.126:1.3_0: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.126:1.3_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho mahānāmaṁ sakkaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an3.126:2.1_2: tathārūpaṁ āvasathaṁ jāna yatthajja mayaṁ ekarattiṁ vihareyyāmā”ti.
an3.126:2.2_1: bhante”ti kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavato paṭissutvā kapilavatthuṁ pavisitvā kevalakappaṁ kapilavatthuṁ
an3.126:2.2_2: anvāhiṇḍanto nāddasa kapilavatthusmiṁ tathārūpaṁ āvasathaṁ yatthajja bhagavā ekarattiṁ vihareyya.
an3.126:3.1_0: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an3.126:3.2_0: “natthi, bhante, kapilavatthusmiṁ tathārūpo āvasatho yatthajja bhagavā ekarattiṁ vihareyya.
an3.126:3.3_0: Ayaṁ, bhante, bharaṇḍu kālāmo bhagavato purāṇasabrahmacārī.
an3.126:3.6_1: bhante”ti kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavato paṭissutvā yena bharaṇḍussa kālāmassa assamo tenupasaṅkami;
an3.126:3.6_2: upasaṅkamitvā santharaṁ paññāpetvā udakaṁ ṭhapetvā pādānaṁ dhovanāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.126:3.7_0: “santhato, bhante, santhāro, udakaṁ ṭhapitaṁ pādānaṁ dhovanāya.
an3.126:4.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā yena bharaṇḍussa kālāmassa assamo tenupasaṅkami;
an3.126:4.6_0: Sve dānāhaṁ bhagavantaṁ payirupāsissāmī”ti bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
an3.126:5.1_0: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.126:5.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho mahānāmaṁ sakkaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an3.126:5.2_0: “tayo khome, mahānāma, satthāro santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.126:5.4_0: Idha, mahānāma, ekacco satthā kāmānaṁ pariññaṁ paññāpeti;
an3.126:5.5_0: na rūpānaṁ pariññaṁ paññāpeti, na vedanānaṁ pariññaṁ paññāpeti.
an3.126:5.6_0: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco satthā kāmānaṁ pariññaṁ paññāpeti, rūpānaṁ pariññaṁ paññāpeti;
an3.126:5.9_0: Ime kho, mahānāma, tayo satthāro santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an3.126:5.10_0: Imesaṁ, mahānāma, tiṇṇaṁ satthārānaṁ ekā niṭṭhā udāhu puthu niṭṭhā”ti?
an3.126:6.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, bharaṇḍu kālāmo mahānāmaṁ sakkaṁ etadavoca:
an3.126:6.3_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā mahānāmaṁ sakkaṁ etadavoca:
an3.126:6.5_0: Dutiyampi kho bharaṇḍu kālāmo mahānāmaṁ sakkaṁ etadavoca:
an3.126:6.7_0: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā mahānāmaṁ sakkaṁ etadavoca:
an3.126:6.9_0: Tatiyampi kho bharaṇḍu kālāmo mahānāmaṁ sakkaṁ etadavoca:
an3.126:6.11_0: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā mahānāmaṁ sakkaṁ etadavoca:
an3.126:7.2_0: “mahesakkhassa vatamhi mahānāmassa sakkassa sammukhā samaṇena gotamena yāvatatiyaṁ apasādito.
an3.126:7.4_0: Atha kho bharaṇḍu kālāmo kapilavatthumhā pakkāmi.
an3.126:7.5_0: Yaṁ kapilavatthumhā pakkāmi tathā pakkantova ahosi na puna paccāgacchīti.
an3.127:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an3.127:1.2_0: Atha kho hatthako devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.127:1.3_0: “bhagavato purato ṭhassāmī”ti osīdatimeva saṁsīdatimeva, na sakkoti saṇṭhātuṁ.
an3.127:1.4_0: Seyyathāpi nāma sappi vā telaṁ vā vālukāya āsittaṁ osīdatimeva saṁsīdatimeva, na saṇṭhāti;
an3.127:1.6_0: “bhagavato purato ṭhassāmī”ti osīdatimeva saṁsīdatimeva, na sakkoti saṇṭhātuṁ.
an3.127:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā hatthakaṁ devaputtaṁ etadavoca:
an3.127:2.3_2: kho hatthako devaputto bhagavato paṭissutvā oḷārikaṁ attabhāvaṁ abhinimminitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
an3.127:2.4_0: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho hatthakaṁ devaputtaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an3.127:3.1_2: api nu te te dhammā etarahi pavattino”ti?
an3.127:3.2_0: “Ye ca me, bhante, dhammā pubbe manussabhūtassa pavattino ahesuṁ, te ca me dhammā etarahi pavattino;
an3.127:3.3_2: te ca me dhammā etarahi pavattino.
an3.127:3.4_1: bhagavā etarahi ākiṇṇo viharati bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi upāsakehi upāsikāhi rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi;
an3.127:3.5_0: evamevaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, ākiṇṇo viharāmi devaputtehi.
an3.127:3.6_0: Dūratopi, bhante, devaputtā āgacchanti hatthakassa devaputtassa santike ‘dhammaṁ sossāmā’ti.
an3.127:3.7_0: Tiṇṇāhaṁ, bhante, dhammānaṁ atitto appaṭivāno kālaṅkato.
an3.127:3.9_0: Bhagavato ahaṁ, bhante, dassanassa atitto appaṭivāno kālaṅkato;
an3.127:3.11_0: saṅghassāhaṁ, bhante, upaṭṭhānassa atitto appaṭivāno kālaṅkato.
an3.127:3.12_0: Imesaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, tiṇṇaṁ dhammānaṁ atitto appaṭivāno kālaṅkatoti.
an3.128:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ viharati isipatane migadāye.
an3.128:1.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya bārāṇasiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
an3.128:1.3_0: Addasā kho bhagavā goyogapilakkhasmiṁ piṇḍāya caramāno aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ rittassādaṁ bāhirassādaṁ muṭṭhassatiṁ
an3.128:2.2_1: kaṭuviyakataṁ attānaṁ āmagandhena avassutaṁ makkhikā nānupatissanti nānvāssavissantīti,
an3.128:2.3_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavatā iminā ovādena ovadito saṁvegamāpādi.
an3.128:2.4_0: Atha kho bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an3.128:3.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, bhikkhave, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya bārāṇasiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisiṁ.
an3.128:3.2_2: goyogapilakkhasmiṁ piṇḍāya caramāno aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ rittassādaṁ bāhirassādaṁ muṭṭhassatiṁ asampajānaṁ asamāhitaṁ vibbhantacittaṁ pākatindriyaṁ.
an3.128:4.2_0: Taṁ vata bhikkhu kaṭuviyakataṁ attānaṁ āmagandhena avassutaṁ makkhikā nānupatissanti nānvāssavissantīti,
an3.128:4.3_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so bhikkhu mayā iminā ovādena ovadito saṁvegamāpādī”ti.
an3.128:4.4_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an3.128:5.4_1: kaṭuviyakataṁ attānaṁ āmagandhena avassutaṁ makkhikā nānupatissanti nānvāssavissantīti,
an3.129:1.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.129:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā anuruddho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an3.129:1.2_1: dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena yebhuyyena passāmi mātugāmaṁ kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā
an3.129:1.3_1: dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjatī”ti?
an3.129:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an3.129:2.3_2: mātugāmo pubbaṇhasamayaṁ maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā agāraṁ ajjhāvasati,
an3.129:2.4_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjatī”ti.
an3.130:1.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
an3.130:1.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an3.130:1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā anuruddho āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an3.130:1.3_0: “idhāhaṁ, āvuso sāriputta, dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṁ lokaṁ olokemi.
an3.130:1.4_0: Āraddhaṁ kho pana me vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ,
an3.130:1.5_0: Atha ca pana me nānupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccatī”ti.
an3.130:2.1_0: “Yaṁ kho te, āvuso anuruddha, evaṁ hoti:
an3.130:2.2_0: ‘ahaṁ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṁ lokaṁ volokemī’ti, idaṁ te mānasmiṁ.
an3.130:2.3_0: Yampi te, āvuso anuruddha, evaṁ hoti:
an3.130:2.5_0: Yampi te, āvuso anuruddha, evaṁ hoti:
an3.130:2.6_0: ‘atha ca pana me nānupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccatī’ti, idaṁ te kukkuccasmiṁ.
an3.130:2.7_0: Sādhu vatāyasmā anuruddho ime tayo dhamme pahāya,
an3.130:2.7_1: ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritvā amatāya dhātuyā cittaṁ upasaṁharatū”ti.
an3.130:3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho aparena samayena ime tayo dhamme pahāya,
an3.130:3.1_1: ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritvā amatāya dhātuyā cittaṁ upasaṁhari.
an3.130:3.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya
an3.130:3.2_2: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
an3.130:3.3_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
an3.130:3.4_0: Aññataro ca panāyasmā anuruddho arahataṁ ahosīti.
an3.131:1.3_0: Mātugāmo, bhikkhave, paṭicchanno āvahati, no vivaṭo;
an3.131:1.4_0: brāhmaṇānaṁ, bhikkhave, mantā paṭicchannā āvahanti, no vivaṭā;
an3.131:1.5_0: micchādiṭṭhi, bhikkhave, paṭicchannā āvahati, no vivaṭā.
an3.131:1.6_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi paṭicchannāni āvahanti, no vivaṭāni.
an3.131:2.1_0: Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, vivaṭāni virocanti, no paṭicchannāni.
an3.131:2.3_0: Candamaṇḍalaṁ, bhikkhave, vivaṭaṁ virocati, no paṭicchannaṁ;
an3.131:2.4_0: sūriyamaṇḍalaṁ, bhikkhave, vivaṭaṁ virocati, no paṭicchannaṁ;
an3.131:2.5_0: tathāgatappavedito dhammavinayo, bhikkhave, vivaṭo virocati, no paṭicchanno.
an3.131:2.6_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi vivaṭāni virocanti, no paṭicchannānī”ti.
an3.132:1.3_0: Pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo, pathavilekhūpamo puggalo, udakalekhūpamo puggalo.
an3.132:1.5_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an3.132:1.6_0: So ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an3.132:1.7_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pāsāṇe lekhā na khippaṁ lujjati vātena vā udakena vā, ciraṭṭhitikā hoti;
an3.132:1.8_0: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an3.132:1.9_0: So ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an3.132:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an3.132:2.3_0: So ca khvassa kodho na dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an3.132:2.4_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pathaviyā lekhā khippaṁ lujjati vātena vā udakena vā, na ciraṭṭhitikā hoti;
an3.132:2.5_0: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an3.132:2.6_0: So ca khvassa kodho na dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an3.132:3.2_2: ekacco puggalo āgāḷhenapi vuccamāno pharusenapi vuccamāno amanāpenapi vuccamāno sandhiyatimeva saṁsandatimeva sammodatimeva.
an3.132:3.3_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, udake lekhā khippaṁyeva paṭivigacchati, na ciraṭṭhitikā hoti;
an3.132:3.4_2: idhekacco puggalo āgāḷhenapi vuccamāno pharusenapi vuccamāno amanāpenapi vuccamāno sandhiyatimeva saṁsandatimeva sammodatimeva.
an3.132:3.6_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an3.133:1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato yodhājīvo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an3.133:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, yodhājīvo dūre pātī ca hoti akkhaṇavedhī ca mahato ca kāyassa padāletā.
an3.133:1.4_2: tīhi aṅgehi samannāgato yodhājīvo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an3.133:1.5_2: tīhi aṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…
an3.133:1.7_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dūre pātī ca hoti akkhaṇavedhī ca mahato ca kāyassa padāletā.
an3.133:2.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dūre pātī hoti?
an3.133:2.2_2: bhikkhu yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
an3.133:2.2_6: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
an3.133:2.3_0: Yā kāci vedanā atītānāgatapaccuppannā ajjhattā vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikā vā sukhumā vā hīnā vā paṇītā vā yā dūre santike vā,
an3.133:2.3_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
an3.133:2.4_0: Yā kāci saññā atītānāgatapaccuppannā ajjhattā vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikā vā sukhumā vā hīnā vā paṇītā vā yā dūre santike vā,
an3.133:2.4_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
an3.133:2.5_0: Ye keci saṅkhārā atītānāgatapaccuppannā ajjhattā vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikā vā sukhumā vā hīnā vā paṇītā vā ye dūre santike vā,
an3.133:2.5_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
an3.133:2.6_0: Yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
an3.133:2.6_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
an3.133:2.7_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dūre pātī hoti.
an3.133:3.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhaṇavedhī hoti.
an3.133:4.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahato kāyassa padāletā hoti?
an3.133:4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahantaṁ avijjākkhandhaṁ padāleti.
an3.133:4.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahato kāyassa padāletā hoti.
an3.133:4.4_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…
an3.134:1.3_0: Ukkācitavinītā parisā, paṭipucchāvinītā parisā, yāvatāvinītā parisā—
an3.135:1.3_0: Duddadaṁ dadāti, dukkaraṁ karoti, dukkhamaṁ khamati—
an3.135:1.4_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi aṅgehi samannāgato mitto sevitabbo”ti.
an3.136:1.4_0: Abhisambujjhitvā abhisametvā ācikkhati deseti paññāpeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti:
an3.136:1.6_2: tathāgatānaṁ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṁ ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā.
an3.136:1.9_0: Abhisambujjhitvā abhisametvā ācikkhati deseti paññāpeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti:
an3.136:1.11_2: tathāgatānaṁ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṁ ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā.
an3.136:1.14_0: Abhisambujjhitvā abhisametvā ācikkhati deseti paññāpeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti:
an3.137:1.1_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yāni kānici tantāvutānaṁ vatthānaṁ, kesakambalo tesaṁ paṭikiṭṭho akkhāyati.
an3.137:1.2_0: Kesakambalo, bhikkhave, sīte sīto, uṇhe uṇho, dubbaṇṇo, duggandho, dukkhasamphasso.
an3.137:1.3_2: yāni kānici puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇavādānaṁ makkhalivādo tesaṁ paṭikiṭṭho akkhāyati.
an3.137:2.3_3: tepi bhagavanto kammavādā ceva ahesuṁ kiriyavādā ca vīriyavādā ca.
an3.137:2.6_3: tepi bhagavanto kammavādā ceva bhavissanti kiriyavādā ca vīriyavādā ca.
an3.137:2.9_0: Ahampi, bhikkhave, etarahi arahaṁ sammāsambuddho kammavādo ceva kiriyavādo ca vīriyavādo ca.
an3.137:3.1_2: nadīmukhe khippaṁ uḍḍeyya bahūnaṁ macchānaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya anayāya byasanāya;
an3.137:3.2_2: makkhali moghapuriso manussakhippaṁ maññe loke uppanno bahūnaṁ sattānaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya anayāya byasanāyā”ti.
an3.140:1.1_0: “Tayo ca, bhikkhave, assakhaḷuṅke desessāmi tayo ca purisakhaḷuṅke.
an3.140:1.2_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an3.140:1.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an3.140:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhaḷuṅko javasampanno hoti; na vaṇṇasampanno, na ārohapariṇāhasampanno.
an3.140:2.3_2: ekacco assakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca;
an3.140:2.4_2: ekacco assakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.140:3.3_2: ekacco purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca;
an3.140:3.4_2: ekacco purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.140:4.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno hoti; na vaṇṇasampanno na ārohapariṇāhasampanno?
an3.140:4.4_0: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṁ puṭṭho saṁsādeti, no vissajjeti.
an3.140:4.8_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno hoti; na vaṇṇasampanno, na ārohapariṇāhasampanno.
an3.140:5.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca; na ārohapariṇāhasampanno?
an3.140:5.4_0: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeti, no saṁsādeti.
an3.140:5.8_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca; na ārohapariṇāhasampanno.
an3.140:6.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca?
an3.140:6.4_0: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeti, no saṁsādeti.
an3.140:6.8_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, purisakhaḷuṅko javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.141:1.1_0: “Tayo ca, bhikkhave, assaparasse desessāmi tayo ca purisaparasse.
an3.141:1.2_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an3.141:1.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an3.141:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assaparasso javasampanno hoti; na vaṇṇasampanno na ārohapariṇāhasampanno.
an3.141:2.3_2: ekacco assaparasso javasampanno hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca;
an3.141:2.4_2: ekacco assaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.141:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco purisaparasso javasampanno hoti; na vaṇṇasampanno na ārohapariṇāhasampanno.
an3.141:3.3_2: ekacco purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca;
an3.141:3.4_2: ekacco purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.141:4.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno hoti; na vaṇṇasampanno, na ārohapariṇāhasampanno?
an3.141:4.2_2: bhikkhu pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
an3.141:4.4_0: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṁ puṭṭho saṁsādeti, no vissajjeti.
an3.141:4.7_0: Idamassa na ārohapariṇāhasmiṁ vadāmi. Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno hoti;
an3.141:5.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca, na ārohapariṇāhasampanno?
an3.141:5.2_2: bhikkhu pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
an3.141:5.4_0: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeti, no saṁsādeti.
an3.141:5.8_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti; vaṇṇasampanno ca, na ārohapariṇāhasampanno.
an3.141:6.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca?
an3.141:6.2_2: bhikkhu pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
an3.141:6.4_0: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeti, no saṁsādeti.
an3.141:6.8_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.142:1.1_0: “Tayo ca, bhikkhave, bhadre assājānīye desessāmi tayo ca bhadre purisājānīye.
an3.142:1.2_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an3.142:1.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an3.142:2.3_0: javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.142:2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo bhadrā assājānīyā.
an3.142:3.1_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, tayo bhadrā purisājānīyā?
an3.142:3.3_0: javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.142:4.2_0: javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca?
an3.142:4.3_2: bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an3.142:4.5_0: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeti, no saṁsādeti.
an3.142:4.9_2: bhadro purisājānīyo javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.142:4.10_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo bhadrā purisājānīyā”ti.
an3.143:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati moranivāpe paribbājakārāme.
an3.143:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu accantaniṭṭho hoti accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno seṭṭho devamanussānaṁ.
an3.143:2.3_0: Asekkhena sīlakkhandhena, asekkhena samādhikkhandhena, asekkhena paññākkhandhena.
an3.143:2.4_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu accantaniṭṭho hoti accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno seṭṭho devamanussānan”ti.
an3.144:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu accantaniṭṭho hoti accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno seṭṭho devamanussānaṁ.
an3.144:1.4_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu accantaniṭṭho hoti accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno seṭṭho devamanussānan”ti.
an3.145:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu accantaniṭṭho hoti accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno seṭṭho devamanussānaṁ.
an3.145:1.4_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu accantaniṭṭho hoti accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno seṭṭho devamanussānan”ti.
an3.146:1.1_0: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an3.146:1.3_0: Akusalena kāyakammena, akusalena vacīkammena, akusalena manokammena—
an3.146:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an3.146:2.1_0: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge.
an3.146:2.3_0: Kusalena kāyakammena, kusalena vacīkammena, kusalena manokammena—
an3.146:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge”ti.
an3.147:1.1_0: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an3.147:1.3_0: Sāvajjena kāyakammena, sāvajjena vacīkammena, sāvajjena manokammena—
an3.147:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an3.147:2.1_0: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge.
an3.147:2.3_0: Anavajjena kāyakammena, anavajjena vacīkammena, anavajjena manokammena—
an3.148:1.2_0: visamena kāyakammena, visamena vacīkammena, visamena manokammena—
an3.148:2.2_0: samena kāyakammena, samena vacīkammena, samena manokammena—
an3.149:1.2_0: asucinā kāyakammena, asucinā vacīkammena, asucinā manokammena—
an3.149:2.2_0: sucinā kāyakammena, sucinā vacīkammena, sucinā manokammena—
an3.149:2.3_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge”ti.
an3.150:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso khataṁ upahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati,
an3.150:1.1_3: sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṁ,
an3.150:1.3_0: Akusalena kāyakammena, akusalena vacīkammena, akusalena manokammena—
an3.150:1.4_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso khataṁ upahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati,
an3.150:1.4_3: sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṁ,
an3.150:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito viyatto sappuriso akkhataṁ anupahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati,
an3.150:2.1_3: anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca viññūnaṁ,
an3.150:2.3_0: Kusalena kāyakammena, kusalena vacīkammena, kusalena manokammena …pe….
an3.151:1.2_0: sāvajjena kāyakammena, sāvajjena vacīkammena, sāvajjena manokammena …pe….
an3.151:2.2_0: anavajjena kāyakammena, anavajjena vacīkammena, anavajjena manokammena …pe….
an3.152:1.2_0: visamena kāyakammena, visamena vacīkammena, visamena manokammena …pe….
an3.152:2.2_0: samena kāyakammena, samena vacīkammena, samena manokammena …pe….
an3.153:1.2_0: asucinā kāyakammena, asucinā vacīkammena, asucinā manokammena …pe….
an3.153:2.2_0: sucinā kāyakammena, sucinā vacīkammena, sucinā manokammena—
an3.153:2.3_2: tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito viyatto sappuriso akkhataṁ anupahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati,
an3.153:2.3_3: anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca viññūnaṁ,
an3.156:1.3_0: Āgāḷhā paṭipadā, nijjhāmā paṭipadā, majjhimā paṭipadā.
an3.156:1.5_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco evaṁvādī hoti evaṁdiṭṭhi:
an3.156:2.2_6: nābhihaṭaṁ na uddissakataṁ na nimantanaṁ sādiyati.
an3.156:2.3_1: na kaḷopimukhā paṭiggaṇhāti na eḷakamantaraṁ na daṇḍamantaraṁ na musalamantaraṁ na dvinnaṁ bhuñjamānānaṁ
an3.156:2.3_2: na gabbhiniyā na pāyamānāya na purisantaragatāya na saṅkittīsu na yattha sā upaṭṭhito hoti na yattha
an3.156:2.3_3: makkhikā saṇḍasaṇḍacārinī na macchaṁ na maṁsaṁ na suraṁ na merayaṁ,
an3.156:2.4_0: So ekāgāriko vā hoti ekālopiko, dvāgāriko vā hoti dvālopiko … sattāgāriko vā hoti sattālopiko;
an3.156:2.5_0: ekissāpi dattiyā yāpeti, dvīhipi dattīhi yāpeti … sattahipi dattīhi yāpeti;
an3.156:2.6_2: sattāhikampi āhāraṁ āhāreti—iti evarūpaṁ addhamāsikampi pariyāyabhattabhojanānuyogamanuyutto viharati.
an3.156:4.7_0: iti evarūpaṁ anekavihitaṁ kāyassa ātāpanaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto viharati.
an3.156:5.2_2: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ;
an3.156:5.5_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
an3.157:1.3_0: Āgāḷhā paṭipadā, nijjhāmā paṭipadā, majjhimā paṭipadā.
an3.157:3.2_2: bhikkhu anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati;
an3.157:3.3_0: uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati;
an3.157:3.4_0: anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati;
an3.157:3.5_0: uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṁ
an3.157:3.5_1: janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati ….
an3.163:1.1_0: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an3.163:1.3_0: Attanā ca pāṇātipātī hoti, parañca pāṇātipāte samādapeti, pāṇātipāte ca samanuñño hoti.
an3.163:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an3.164:1.1_0: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge.
an3.165:1.1_0: Attanā ca adinnādāyī hoti, parañca adinnādāne samādapeti, adinnādāne ca samanuñño hoti …pe….
an3.169:1.1_0: Attanā ca musāvādī hoti, parañca musāvāde samādapeti, musāvāde ca samanuñño hoti …pe….
an3.172:1.1_0: Attanā ca pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti,
an3.172:1.1_2: pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti …pe….
an3.174:1.1_0: Attanā ca pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti,
an3.174:1.1_2: pharusāya vācāya veramaṇiyā ca samanuñño hoti …pe….
an3.177:1.1_0: Attanā ca abhijjhālu hoti, parañca abhijjhāya samādapeti, abhijjhāya ca samanuñño hoti …pe….
an3.178:1.1_0: Attanā ca anabhijjhālu hoti, parañca anabhijjhāya samādapeti, anabhijjhāya ca samanuñño hoti …pe….
an3.179:1.1_0: Attanā ca byāpannacitto hoti, parañca byāpāde samādapeti, byāpāde ca samanuñño hoti …pe….
an3.180:1.1_0: Attanā ca abyāpannacitto hoti, parañca abyāpāde samādapeti, abyāpāde ca samanuñño hoti …pe….
an3.182:1.1_0: Attanā ca sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, parañca sammādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti, sammādiṭṭhiyā ca samanuñño hoti.
an3.182:1.2_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge”ti.
an3.183-352:1.3_0: Suññato samādhi, animitto samādhi, appaṇihito samādhi—
an3.183-352:1.4_0: rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime tayo dhammā bhāvetabbā. (…)
an3.183-352:4.2_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
